simulation results demonstrate that, compared to the existing $2\times2$ MIMO
configuration in the OAI, our implementation improves the data rates in almost
all scenarios, especially at the high Signal-to-Noise-Ratios (SNRs).

</details>


### [419] [An Implementation of Multi-User MIMO Downlink for O-RAN 5G New Radio using OpenAirInterface](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25512)
*Duc Tung Bui,Le-Nam Tran*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 我们首次在5G O-RAN的PDSCH上实现了MU-MIMO传输方案，并使用OAI进行了验证。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在5G O-RAN的PDSCH上实现并验证MU-MIMO传输方案。

Method: 实现了包含5G核心网、CU/DU分离的5G RAN以及UE的完整O-RAN 5G NR系统，并基于UE报告的PMI进行用户调度，通过iperf评估系统吞吐量。

Result: 在仿真和测试平台实验中，MU-MIMO方案在 downlink 实现了显著的吞吐量增益，尤其在高信噪比区域，同时保持BLER低于10^-1。

Conclusion: 所提出的MU-MIMO方案在5G O-RAN的PDSCH上是可行的，并能有效提升下行吞吐量。

Abstract: We present the first implementation of a Multi-User Multiple-Input
Multiple-Output (MU-MIMO) transmission scheme on the Physical Downlink Shared
Channel (PDSCH) for 5G Open Radio Access Network (O-RAN) based on
OpenAirInterface (OAI). Our implementation features a fully functional
O-RAN-compliant 5G New Radio (5G NR) system, including a 5G Core Network (5G
CN), a refined 5G RAN, which is split into a Centre Unit (CU) and an
Distributed Unit (DU), and 5G NR User Equipment (UEs). This implementation
demonstrates MU-MIMO performance in the downlink while showcasing the
disaggregation capabilities of O-RAN. Specifically, the Base Station (i.e. gNB)
in our setup is capable of serving two UEs simultaneously over the same
downlink Resource Block (RBs). User scheduling is performed based on the
Precoding Matrix Indicators (PMIs) reported by the UEs according to the NR
Channel State Information (CSI) reporting procedure. The system throughput
performance is evaluated using $\textit{iperf}$. The obtained results via
simulation and testbed experiments demonstrate that the MU-MIMO scheme achieves
significant downlink throughput gains, particularly in the high
Signal-to-Noise-Ratio (SNR) regime, while keeping the Block Error Rate (BLER)
below the required threshold of $10^{-1}$ for both UEs.

</details>


### [420] [Joint UE positioning and distributed sensing in the upper mid-band exploiting virtual apertures](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25557)
*Soroush Mesforush,Murat Bayraktar,Nuria González-Prelcic*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种用于分布式集成传感与通信（DISAC）系统的信号处理方法，该系统在FR3频段运行，并使用MIMO-OFDM波形。该方法能够同时进行车辆用户设备（UE）定位和目标定位，并考虑了实际的系统效应，如节点间定时偏移、扩展目标、密集多径和实际天线阵列。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为提升分布式集成传感与通信（DISAC）系统在FR3频段的定位和感知性能，特别是在使用大型天线阵列和宽带宽的场景下。

Method: 提出了一种信号处理方法，包括多径估计、杂波去除、聚类与关联方案，以及联合估计UE位置和目标位置的加权最小二乘（WLS）问题求解。

Result: 在包含两个UE和两个目标的仿真中，80%的情况下目标定位误差小于32厘米，UE定位误差小于44厘米。

Conclusion: 所提出的DISAC系统信号处理方法在实际应用场景下，能够有效地实现UE和目标的联合定位，并取得了较高的精度。

Abstract: Networks exploiting distributed integrated sensing and communication (DISAC)
nodes can provide enhanced localization and sensing performance, further
emphasized when operating with large arrays and bandwidths available in the
upper mid-band (also known as FR3). In this paper, we consider a DISAC system
operating at FR3 where a single base station (BS) acts as the transmitter and
several vehicular user equipments (UEs) act as the receivers. We tackle the
design of the signal processing chain at the UE side to enable joint UE
positioning and target localization. The system model exploits a
multiple-input-multiple-output orthogonal frequency division multiplexing
(MIMO-OFDM) waveform, and incorporates practical effects such as inter-node
timing offsets (TOs), extended targets, dense multipath, and realistic uniform
planar arrays (UPAs) at both ends. The proposed design includes a multipath
estimation stage at each UE, clutter removal, a novel clustering and
association scheme, and a final joint estimator of UE positions and target
locations. The estimator solves a weighted least squares (WLS) problem to
jointly compute clock offsets and localize UEs and targets. Numerical results
considering two UEs and two targets show that for 80\% of the cases the target
localization error is below 32cm, while the UE positioning error is below 44cm.

</details>


### [421] [Rotatable Antenna-Enabled Spectrum Sharing in Cognitive Radio Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25656)
*Yanhua Tan,Beixiong Zheng,Yi Fang,Derrick Wing Kwan Ng,Rui Zhang,Jie Xu*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种新型的、由旋转天线（RA）辅助的认知无线电（CR）系统，旨在实现高效的频谱共享，同时减轻主要和次要通信链路之间的干扰。通过联合优化发送波束成形和RA的 the boresight方向，以最大化次要接收器（SR）处接收到的信噪比（SINR），同时满足主要接收器（PR）处的干扰约束和次要发送器（ST）处的最大发送功率约束。利用交替优化（AO）和连续凸近似（SCA）技术，开发了一种有效的算法来解决该非凸问题。仿真结果表明，与传统方案相比，所提出的RA辅助系统在频谱共享CR系统中具有显著优势，能够同时提高SR的通信质量并减少对PR的干扰。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: RA技术因其利用额外的空间自由度（DoFs）和动态调整天线三维视线方向的能力，在无线通信系统中引起了广泛关注。本研究的动机是利用RA技术来提升CR系统的性能，实现更高效的频谱共享并减少干扰。

Method: 提出了一种用于RA辅助CR系统的优化问题，该问题旨在联合设计发送波束成形和RA的视线方向，以最大化次要接收器（SR）的信噪比（SINR），同时满足主要接收器（PR）的干扰约束和次要发送器（ST）的最大发射功率约束。开发了一种结合交替优化（AO）和连续凸近似（SCA）技术的算法来解决此非凸问题。

Result: 数值结果表明，与传统的基准方案相比，所提出的RA辅助系统在频谱共享CR系统中表现出显著的性能提升。RA技术能够同时增强SR的通信质量并减轻对PR的干扰。

Conclusion: RA技术能够有效地应用于CR系统，通过优化波束成形和天线方向，在实现高效频谱共享的同时，有效提高接收信号质量并减少干扰。RA在增强通信和干扰抑制方面都展现了其优越性。

Abstract: Rotatable antenna (RA) technology has recently drawn significant attention in
wireless systems owing to its unique ability to exploit additional spatial
degrees-of-freedom (DoFs) by dynamically adjusting the three-dimensional (3D)
boresight direction of each antenna. In this letter, we propose a new
RA-assisted cognitive radio (CR) system designed to achieve efficient spectrum
sharing while mitigating interference between primary and secondary
communication links. Specifically, we formulate an optimization problem for the
joint design of the transmit beamforming and the boresight directions of RAs at
the secondary transmitter (ST), aimed at maximizing the received
signal-to-interference-plus-noise ratio (SINR) at the secondary receiver (SR),
while satisfying both interference constraint at the primary receiver (PR) and
the maximum transmit power constraint at the ST. Although the formulated
problem is challenging to solve due to its non-convexity and coupled variables,
we develop an efficient algorithm by leveraging alternating optimization (AO)
and successive convex approximation (SCA) techniques to acquire high-quality
solutions. Numerical results demonstrate that the proposed RA-assisted system
substantially outperforms conventional benchmark schemes in spectrum-sharing CR
systems, validating RA's capability to simultaneously enhance the communication
quality at the SR and mitigate interference at the PR.

</details>


### [422] [A Novel Statistical Analysis Method for Radiation Source Classification](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25675)
*Haobo Geng,Yaoyao Li,Weiping Tong,Youwei Meng,Houpu Xiao,Yicong Liu*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本研究提出一种结合线性判别分析（LDA）和粗糙邻域集（NRS）的信号分类方法，并能在特定条件下将所有调制类型分为四类。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 随着电子信息技术的快速发展，未知辐射源的数量和种类显著增加，但针对辐射源分类的研究仍然有限。

Method: 提出一种结合线性判别分析（LDA）和粗糙邻域集（NRS）的大数据分析方法用于辐射源分类。

Result: 在RadioML 2018数据集上验证了该方法的有效性，结果表明在特定约束条件下，所有调制类型可被归纳为四类。

Conclusion: 该研究为认知干扰信号的消除奠定了基础。

Abstract: With the rapid advancement of electronic information technology, the number
and variety of unknown radiation sources have increased significantly. Some of
these sources share common characteristics, which offers the potential to
effectively address the challenge of identifying unknown radiation sources.
However, research on the classification of radiation sources remains relatively
limited. This paper proposes a big data analysis method that combines linear
discriminant analysis (LDA) with a rough neighborhood set (NRS) for radiation
source classification, and its effectiveness is validated on the RadioML 2018
dataset. The results indicate that, under certain constraints, all modulation
types can be categorized into four distinct classes, laying a foundation for
further research on cognitive interference signal cancellation.

</details>


### [423] [Transformer-Based Rate Prediction for Multi-Band Cellular Handsets](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25722)
*Ruibin Chen,Haozhe Lei,Hao Guo,Marco Mezzavilla,Hitesh Poddar,Tomoki Yoshimura,Sundeep Rangan*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 用户设备（UE）需要支持从FR1到FR3的多个频段，但受限于设备尺寸、硬件和功耗，面临信道跟踪的挑战。本文提出一种基于Transformer的神经网络，能够利用稀疏的历史测量数据预测多天线和多频段的可用速率，并在仿真中验证了其优于基线预测器的性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在日益增长的移动通信需求下，用户设备（UE）需要支持从FR1到FR3的更宽频谱范围，这在受限于尺寸、硬件和功耗的用户设备中带来了多频段信道跟踪的严峻挑战。

Method: 提出一种基于Transformer的神经网络架构，该架构以异步的速率历史数据作为输入，并输出每个天线阵列的速率预测。

Result: 在FR1和FR3阵列的城市微蜂窝环境中，利用射线追踪模拟对所提出的方法进行了评估，结果显示其性能优于基线预测器。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于Transformer的方法能够克服移动性和硬件限制，在现实场景下更有效地进行多频段选择。

Abstract: Cellular wireless systems are witnessing the proliferation of frequency bands
over a wide spectrum, particularly with the expansion of new bands in FR3.
These bands must be supported in user equipment (UE) handsets with multiple
antennas in a constrained form factor. Rapid variations in channel quality
across the bands from motion and hand blockage, limited field-of-view of
antennas, and hardware and power-constrained measurement sparsity pose
significant challenges to reliable multi-band channel tracking. This paper
formulates the problem of predicting achievable rates across multiple antenna
arrays and bands with sparse historical measurements. We propose a
transformer-based neural architecture that takes asynchronous rate histories as
input and outputs per-array rate predictions. Evaluated on ray-traced
simulations in a dense urban micro-cellular setting with FR1 and FR3 arrays,
our method demonstrates superior performance over baseline predictors, enabling
more informed band selection under realistic mobility and hardware constraints.

</details>


### [424] [Doppler-Based Multistatic Drone Tracking via Cellular Downlink Signals](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25732)
*Chenqing Ji,Qionghui Liu,Jiahong Liu,Chao Yu,Yifei Sun,Rui Wang,Fan Liu*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种利用下行链路LTE信号的多站多普勒传感系统来追踪无人机。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了实现仅依靠多站多普勒测量就能高精度地追踪无人机轨迹，即使在缺乏距离和角度信息的情况下。

Method: 利用LTE基站作为信号源，部署三个独立的传感接收器，通过测量无人机相对于不同接收器的双站多普勒频率，并结合最小均方误差问题来重构无人机的初始位置和速度。

Result: 在距离基站约200米的实际场景中，该系统能够以小于90厘米的误差追踪复杂的无人机轨迹，精度远超LTE信号的典型距离分辨率。

Conclusion: 通过提高接收器部署密度，仅依靠多普勒检测就能实现高精度的无人机轨迹追踪是可行的。

Abstract: In this paper, a multistatic Doppler sensing system is proposed for the drone
tracking via downlink Long-Term Evolution (LTE) signals. Specifically, the LTE
base stations (BSs) are exploited as signal illuminators, and three passive
sensing receivers are deployed at different locations to detect the bistatic
Doppler frequencies of a target drone from received downlink signals. It is
shown that even without the measurements of BS-drone-receiver range and angle,
the Doppler measurements could provide sufficient information for trajectory
tracking. Particularly, the trajectory of the target drone, consisting of the
initial position and velocities of all the time slots, can be reconstructed by
solving a minimum mean-squared error problem according to the above Doppler
measurements. It is demonstrated by experiment that although the target drone
and all the sensing receivers are around 200 meters away from the illuminating
BSs, the complicated trajectories can be tracked with 90% errors below 90
centimeters. Since this accuracy is notably higher than the typical range
resolution of LTE signals, the demonstration shows that drone trajectory
tracking with a high accuracy could be feasible solely according to Doppler
detection, as long as the deployment density of receivers is sufficiently high.

</details>


### [425] [Digital Twin Aided Massive MIMO CSI Feedback: Exploring the Impact of Twinning Fidelity](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25793)
*Hao Luo,Shuaifeng Jiang,Saeed R. Khosravirad,Ahmed Alkhateeb*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本论文提出使用数字孪生来辅助深度学习模型训练，以解决大规模 MIMO 系统中信道状态信息（CSI）压缩和重建的数据收集挑战。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 大规模 MIMO 系统中 CSI 反馈开销大，深度学习（DL）压缩方法依赖大量场地特定的训练数据，而实际收集成本高昂且难以扩展。

Method: 提出利用数字孪生（包括电磁 3D 模型、硬件模型和射线追踪）生成场地特定的合成 CSI 数据，用于训练 DL 模型，并提出一个保真度分析框架，将数字孪生质量分解为 3D 几何、材料属性、射线追踪和硬件建模四个方面。此外，还提出了一种结合少量真实数据对数字孪生预训练模型进行微调的精炼策略。

Result: 在数字孪生上训练的模型优于在通用数据集上训练的模型，并且所提出的精炼方法能有效利用少量真实数据提升性能。仿真结果还表明，数字孪生的保真度（尤其是在 3D 几何、射线追踪和硬件建模方面）对提高 CSI 重建质量至关重要。

Conclusion: 数字孪生可以有效辅助 DL 模型训练，解决 CSI 反馈开销问题，并且所提出的保真度分析框架有助于优化数字孪生开发和部署策略。

Abstract: Deep learning (DL) techniques have demonstrated strong performance in
compressing and reconstructing channel state information (CSI) while reducing
feedback overhead in massive MIMO systems. A key challenge, however, is their
reliance on extensive site-specific training data, whose real-world collection
incurs significant overhead and limits scalability across deployment sites. To
address this, we propose leveraging site-specific digital twins to assist the
training of DL-based CSI compression models. The digital twin integrates an
electromagnetic (EM) 3D model of the environment, a hardware model, and ray
tracing to produce site-specific synthetic CSI data, allowing DL models to be
trained without the need for extensive real-world measurements. We further
develop a fidelity analysis framework that decomposes digital twin quality into
four key aspects: 3D geometry, material properties, ray tracing, and hardware
modeling. We explore how these factors influence the reliability of the data
and model performance. To enhance the adaptability to real-world environments,
we propose a refinement strategy that incorporates a limited amount of
real-world data to fine-tune the DL model pre-trained on the digital twin
dataset. Evaluation results show that models trained on site-specific digital
twins outperform those trained on generic datasets, with the proposed
refinement method effectively enhancing performance using limited real-world
data. The simulations also highlight the importance of digital twin fidelity,
especially in 3D geometry, ray tracing, and hardware modeling, for improving
CSI reconstruction quality. This analysis framework offers valuable insights
into the critical fidelity aspects, and facilitates more efficient digital twin
development and deployment strategies for various wireless communication tasks.

</details>


### [426] [Delay-Doppler Domain Channel Measurements and Modeling in High-Speed Railways](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25854)
*Hao Zhou,Yiyan Ma,Dan Fei,Weirong Liu,Zhengyu Zhang,Mi Yang,Guoyu Ma,Yunlong Lu,Ruisi He,Guoyu Wang,Cheng Li,Zhaohui Song,Bo Ai*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: Error


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Error

Method: Error

Result: Error

Conclusion: Error

Abstract: As next-generation wireless communication systems need to be able to operate
in high-frequency bands and high-mobility scenarios, delay-Doppler (DD) domain
multicarrier (DDMC) modulation schemes, such as orthogonal time frequency space
(OTFS), demonstrate superior reliability over orthogonal frequency division
multiplexing (OFDM). Accurate DD domain channel modeling is essential for DDMC
system design. However, since traditional channel modeling approaches are
mainly confined to time, frequency, and space domains, the principles of DD
domain channel modeling remain poorly studied. To address this issue, we
propose a systematic DD domain channel measurement and modeling methodology in
high-speed railway (HSR) scenarios. First, we design a DD domain channel
measurement method based on the long-term evolution for railway (LTE-R) system.
Second, for DD domain channel modeling, we investigate quasi-stationary
interval, statistical power modeling of multipath components, and particularly,
the quasi-invariant intervals of DD domain channel fading coefficients. Third,
via LTE-R measurements at 371 km/h, taking the quasi-stationary interval as the
decision criterion, we establish DD domain channel models under different
channel time-varying conditions in HSR scenarios. Fourth, the accuracy of
proposed DD domain channel models is validated via bit error rate comparison of
OTFS transmission. In addition, simulation verifies that in HSR scenario, the
quasi-invariant interval of DD domain channel fading coefficient is on
millisecond (ms) order of magnitude, which is much smaller than the
quasi-stationary interval length on $100$ ms order of magnitude. This study
could provide theoretical guidance for DD domain modeling in high-mobility
environments, supporting future DDMC and integrated sensing and communication
designs for 6G and beyond.

</details>


### [427] [Closed-Form Least-Squares Design of Fast-Convolution Based Variable-Bandwidth FIR Filters](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25931)
*Oksana Moryakova,Håkan Johansson*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 提出了一种基于快速卷积（FC）的可变带宽（VBW）有限脉冲响应（FIR）滤波器的闭式最小二乘（LS）设计方法，该方法利用频率采样和重叠保存（OLS）方法，显著降低了实现和在线带宽重构的复杂性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 提出一种用于FC-VRF的闭式LS设计方法，旨在降低实现和在线带宽重构的复杂性。

Method: 利用频率采样和OLS方法，通过考虑一组对应的时不变脉冲响应来实现VBW滤波器的频域实现，并在此基础上进行LS设计。

Result: 该方法实现了FC-VRF的闭式设计，与现有解决方案相比，在给定性能下复杂度显著降低，并且可以在不增加复杂性的情况下扩展可变带宽范围。通过引入权重函数，还可以减小LPTV系统时不变滤波器集上的最大逼近误差能量。

Conclusion: 所提出的LS设计方法能够实现FC-VRF的闭式设计，并有效降低滤波器的实现复杂性。

Abstract: This paper introduces a closed-form least-squares (LS) design approach for
fast-convolution (FC) based variable-bandwidth (VBW) finite-impulse-response
(FIR) filters. The proposed LS design utilizes frequency sampling and the VBW
filter frequency-domain implementation using the overlap-save (OLS) method,
that together offer significant savings in implementation and online bandwidth
reconfiguration complexities. Since combining frequency-domain design and OLS
implementation leads to a linear periodic time-varying (LPTV) behavior of the
VBW filter, a set of the corresponding time-invariant impulse responses is
considered in the proposed design. Through numerical examples, it is
demonstrated that the proposed approach enables not only closed-form design of
FC-based VBW filters with substantial complexity reductions compared to
existing solutions for a given performance, but also allows the variable
bandwidth range to be extended without any increase in complexity. Moreover, a
way of reducing the maximum approximation error energy over the whole set of
the time-invariant filters of the LPTV system is shown by introducing
appropriate weighting functions in the design.

</details>


### [428] [Joint Communications, Sensing, and Positioning in 6G Multi-Functional Satellite Systems: Survey and Open Challenges](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25937)
*Chandan Kumar Sheemar,Jorge Querol,Wali Ullah Khan,Prabhu Thiruvasagam,Sourabh Solanki,Idir Edjekouane,Alejandro Gonzalez-Garrido,Mohammed Al-Ansi,Carla E. Garcia,Symeon Chatzinotas*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 多功能卫星系统（MFSS）通过将通信、传感和PNT等多种功能集成到单个有效载荷中，有望在6G网络中实现更高效、经济和可持续的卫星通信。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了满足6G网络对通信、传感和定位、导航和授时（PNT）的广泛需求，同时克服当前功能单一的有效载荷架构带来的成本、频谱利用和可持续性挑战。

Method: 提出了一种多功能卫星系统（MFSS）的框架，该框架将两种或多种核心服务集成到单个有效载荷中，并提出了一种统一的分类法，涵盖联合通信与传感（JCAS）、联合通信与PNT（JCAP）、联合传感与PNT（JSAP）以及完全集成的联合通信、传感与PNT（JCSAP）系统。对每个领域进行了综述，并概述了合作、集成和联合设计策略。

Result: MFSS能够实现更高的频谱效率、更低的发射质量和成本、改进的能源使用以及增强的服务多样性，从而促进可持续和智能的非地面网络（NTN）的发展。

Conclusion: MFSS通过在单个平台上统一各种卫星能力，是实现6G及以后空间时代可持续和智能通信的关键。

Abstract: Satellite systems are expected to be a cornerstone of sixth-generation (6G)
networks, providing ubiquitous coverage and supporting a wide range of services
across communications, sensing, and positioning, navigation, and timing (PNT).
Meeting these demands with current function-specific payload architectures is
challenging in terms of cost, spectral use, and sustainability. This survey
introduces the framework of multi-functional satellite systems (MFSS), which
integrate two or more of these core services into a single payload, enabling
resource sharing and functional synergy. A unified taxonomy is proposed,
covering joint communications and sensing (JCAS), joint communications and PNT
(JCAP), joint sensing and PNT (JSAP), and fully integrated joint
communications, sensing, and PNT (JCSAP) systems. The paper reviews the
state-of-the-art in each domain, examines existing payload architectures, and
outlines cooperative, integrated, and joint design strategies. Key challenges,
including waveform co-design, synchronization, interference mitigation, and
resource management, are discussed, along with potential solutions and future
research directions. By unifying diverse satellite capabilities within a single
platform, MFSS can achieve higher spectral efficiency, reduced launch mass and
cost, improved energy use, and enhanced service versatility, contributing to
the development of sustainable and intelligent non-terrestrial networks (NTNs)
for the 6G and beyond space era.

</details>


### [429] [Neural Network State-Space Estimators](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25959)
*Minxing Sun,Li Miao,Qingyu Shen,Yao Mao,Qiliang Bao*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 提出了一种统一的状态空间结构，无需目标状态空间模型，并将输入层激活和所有网络权重都视为在线估计的潜在状态。该模型使用扩展卡尔曼估计器、无迹卡尔曼估计器和粒子估计器进行实例化，并在三种代表性场景中与七种领先的神经网络估计器进行了基准测试。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 克服了传统状态估计算法依赖预定义模型和神经网络估计器缺乏经典估计理论融合及需要大量预计算训练集的局限性。

Method: 提出了一种统一的状态空间结构，无需目标状态空间模型，并将输入层激活和所有网络权重作为潜在状态进行在线估计。使用三种经典估计器（扩展卡尔曼、无迹卡尔曼、粒子）进行实例化。

Result: 所提出的神经网络状态空间估计器在保留鲁棒学习能力的同时，在准确性上匹配或超过了经典方法和预训练的神经网络方法。

Conclusion: 所提出的方法提供了一种通用且准确的状态估计方法，能够适应动态变化且无需目标的状态空间模型。

Abstract: Classical state estimation algorithms rely on predefined target's state-space
model, which complicates model derivation and limits adaptability when system
dynamics change. Neural network based estimators offer a data-driven
alternative, but rarely fuse classical estimation theory into their structure
and demand large, pre-computed training sets. To overcome these limitations, we
propose a unified state-space structure without target's state-space model and
treats both the input-layer activations and all network weights as latent
states to be estimated online. We instantiate this nonlinear model with three
canonical estimators-the extended Kalman estimator, the unscented Kalman
estimator, and the particle estimator to simulate different neural network and
demonstrate its generality. We then benchmark our approach against seven
leading neural network estimators across three representative scenarios.
Results show that our neural network state-space estimators not only retain the
robust learning capability, but also match or exceed the accuracy of both
classical and pre-trained neural network methods. Code, data, and more result:
github.com/ShineMinxing/PaperNNSSE.git

</details>


### [430] [Performance Evaluation of eLoran Spatial ASF Corrections Based on Measured ASF Map](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26018)
*Jaewon Yu,Pyo-Woong Son*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 文章对韩国 eLoran 系统中空间 ASF 校正方法的有效性进行了分析，并得出了局部 ASF 校正可显著提高定位性能的结论。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 评估空间 ASF 校正方法在韩国 eLoran 系统中的有效性。

Method: 通过模拟三种校正场景（无校正 S0、局部校正 S1、广域校正 S2）并比较定位误差。

Result: S1 表现出最低的定位误差，S0 误差最大，S2 在参考站附近有改善但随着距离增加而恶化。

Conclusion: 局部 ASF 校正能显著提高 eLoran 定位性能，而广域校正仅在局部区域有益。

Abstract: This paper analyzes the effectiveness of spatial ASF correction methods in
the Korean eLoran system using measured ASF maps. Three correction scenarios
were evaluated under identical simulation settings: no correction (S0), local
correction using true ASF values (S1), and wide-area correction using a single
reference station value (S2). Simulation results show that S1 consistently
achieved the lowest positioning errors, while S0 exhibited the largest errors
with extensive high-error regions. S2 provided limited improvements near the
reference station but degraded with increasing distance and ASF spatial
gradients. The findings highlight that local ASF correction significantly
improves eLoran positioning performance, whereas wide-area correction has only
localized benefits.

</details>


### [431] [Path-Based Correlation Analysis of Meteorological Factors and eLoran Signal Delay Variations](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26020)
*Junwoo Song,Pyo-woong Son*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: eLoran的抗干扰能力强于GNSS，但在信号传播延迟方面受气象因素影响。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 分析eLoran信号传播延迟与气象因素的时间相关性，以解决eLoran信号延迟易受地表条件变化影响的问题。

Method: 分析eLoran信号传播延迟在不同地理位置的时间变化与气象因素（如地形和气象变化）的相关性。

Result: （摘要未提供具体结果）

Conclusion: （摘要未提供具体结论）

Abstract: Unlike GNSS, which is vulnerable to jamming and spoofing due to its
inherently weak received power, eLoran exhibits robustness owing to its high
field strength. Therefore, the eLoran system can maintain reliable operation
even in scenarios where GNSS becomes unavailable. However, since eLoran signals
propagate through ground waves, the propagation delay is susceptible to changes
in surface conditions, including both terrain and meteorological variations.
This study aims to analyze the correlation between the temporal variations in
eLoran signal propagation delay and meteorological factors at various points
along the signal path.

</details>


### [432] [Enhancing Connectivity for Emergency Vehicles Through UAV Trajectory and Resource Allocation Optimization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26067)
*S. Fatemeh Bozorgi,S. Mohammad Razavizadeh,Mohsen Rezaee*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种无人机辅助的应急车辆通信系统，通过优化无人机轨迹和带宽分配，在满足应急车辆通信需求的同时，最大化普通车辆的平均数据速率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了在各种交通和环境条件下有效支持救护车和消防车等应急车辆的运行，需要有效的通信系统。

Method: 提出了一种联合优化方法，对无人机轨迹规划和动态带宽分配（DBA）进行协调。该方法将问题分解为两个子问题：带宽分配和无人机轨迹设计，并使用连续凸近似（SCA）方法迭代求解。

Result: 与基线方法相比，所提出的解决方案在满足服务要求方面实现了卓越的性能。

Conclusion: 所提出的无人机辅助通信系统能够有效地满足应急车辆的实时通信需求，并优化普通车辆的通信性能。

Abstract: Effective communication for emergency vehicles - such as ambulances and fire
trucks - is essential to support their operations in various traffic and
environmental conditions. In this context, this paper investigates a vehicular
communication system assisted by an Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV), which
adjusts its trajectory and resource allocation according to communication
needs. The system classifies vehicles into two groups to address their varying
service requirements: emergency vehicles, which require a minimum instantaneous
data rate to access critical information timely, and normal vehicles. To
support both categories effectively, this paper proposes a joint optimization
approach that coordinates UAV trajectory planning and Dynamic Bandwidth
Allocation (DBA). The objective is to maximize the minimum average data rate
for normal vehicles while ensuring that emergency vehicles maintain an
instantaneous rate above a predefined threshold. This approach takes into
account some system constraints, including UAV propulsion power consumption,
mobility limitations, and backhaul capacity. To tackle the resulting non-convex
problem, an iterative optimization method is employed, where the original
problem is decomposed into two subproblems: bandwidth allocation and UAV
trajectory design. In each iteration, the trajectory subproblem is solved using
the Successive Convex Approximation (SCA) method. Numerical results confirm
that the proposed solution achieves superior performance in meeting service
requirements compared to baseline methods.

</details>


### [433] [Secrecy-Driven Beamforming for Multi-User Integrated Sensing and Communication](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26249)
*Ali Khandan Boroujeni,Hyeon Seok Rou,Ghazal Bagheri,Kuranage Roche Rayan Ranasinghe,Giuseppe Thadeu Freitas de Abreu,Stefan Köpsell,Rafael F. Schaefer*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种安全集成传感与通信（ISAC）框架，用于多用户系统，其中包含多个通信用户（CUs）和对抗性目标。该框架旨在联合传感和通信约束下最大化保密速率。通过利用加速分数规划方法和非齐次复二次变换（QT），问题被分解为可处理的波束成形和人工噪声（AN）优化子问题。与传统方法不同，该方法利用AN来增强传感能力，同时避免干扰合法用户。仿真结果表明，该框架在保密速率、通信可靠性和传感精度方面均有显著提升，验证了其有效性和可扩展性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本文旨在解决多用户ISAC系统中的保密性问题，提出一种能够最大化保密速率同时满足通信和传感约束的框架。

Method: 本文提出了一种基于加速分数规划和非齐次复二次变换（QT）的方法，将原问题分解为波束成形和人工噪声（AN）优化的子问题，并利用AN增强传感能力。

Result: 仿真结果表明，所提出的ISAC框架在保密速率、通信可靠性和传感精度方面取得了显著的性能提升。

Conclusion: 所提出的ISAC框架能够有效地在多用户系统中最大化保密速率，同时提高通信可靠性和传感精度，并具有良好的可扩展性。

Abstract: This paper proposes a secure integrated sensing and communications (ISAC)
framework for multi-user systems with multiple communication users (CUs) and
adversarial targets, where the design problem is formulated to maximize secrecy
rate under joint sensing and communication constraints. An efficient solution
is presented based on an accelerated fractional programming method using a
non-homogeneous complex quadratic transform (QT), which decomposes the problem
into tractable subproblems for beamforming and artificial noise (AN)
optimization. Unlike conventional artificial noise strategies, the proposed
approach also exploits AN to enhance sensing while avoiding interference with
legitimate users. Simulation results show significant gains in secrecy rate,
communication reliability, and sensing accuracy, confirming the effectiveness
and scalability of the proposed framework.

</details>


### [434] [FinGAN: An Interpretable RSS Generation Network for Scalable Fingerprint Localization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26286)
*Jiaming Zhang,Jiajun He,Jie Zhang,Okan Yurduseven*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: FinGAN是一个新的RSS数据生成器，可以直接从参考点（RPs）生成RSS数据，并且生成的数据与真实数据高度一致，能保持与真实数据集相当的定位性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的生成对抗模型在生成RSS数据时，要么依赖已知的参考位置（RPs），要么依赖预定义的先验知识。然而，FinGAN旨在学习RPs和RSS值之间的潜在信息，以实现端到端的RSS生成，从而生成先前未测量过的RPs的RSS数据。

Method: FinGAN通过最大化生成RSS数据和RPs之间的互信息来学习它们之间的潜在联系，从而实现从RPs到RSS的直接生成。

Result: FinGAN生成的合成RSS数据与真实RSS样本高度一致，在定位性能上可以与完整的真实数据集相媲美。此外，在三个典型的办公环境的开源数据集上的实验也证明了FinGAN的广泛适用性。

Conclusion: FinGAN能够生成高质量的RSS数据，克服了现有方法的局限性，并在多种环境下都表现出优越的性能和泛化能力。

Abstract: This work introduces FinGAN, a robust received signal strength (RSS) data
generator designed to expand RSS fingerprint datasets. Compared to existing
generative adversarial models that either rely on known reference positions
(RPs) or depend on predefined priors, FinGAN learns the latent information
between RPs and RSS values by maximizing the mutual information between the
generated RSS data and the RPs, enabling an end-to-end RSS generation directly
from RPs. This allows us to accurately generate RSS data for previously
unmeasured RPs. Both quantitative and qualitative evaluations demonstrate that
FinGAN produces synthetic RSS data closely aligned with real RSS sample
collected from the on-site experiment, preserving localization performance
comparable to that achieved with complete real-world datasets. To further
validate its generalizability, FinGAN is also trained and evaluated on
open-source datasets from three typical office environments,and the results
demonstrate consistent performance across different scenarios.

</details>


### [435] [Ultra-Reliable Risk-Aggregated Sum Rate Maximization via Model-Aided Deep Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26311)
*Hassaan Hashmi,Spyridon Pougkakiotis,Dionysis Kalogerias*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种新颖的风险聚合方法，使用条件在险价值 (CVaR) 来解决 MISO 下行链路无线网络中的加权和速率最大化问题，并提出了一种名为 αRGNN 的 GNN 策略函数逼近方法来处理信道衰落不确定性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在具有用户速率可靠性要求的 MISO 下行链路无线网络中，最大化加权和速率。

Method: 提出了一种基于 CVaR 的风险聚合方法，并设计了一种名为 αRGNN 的 GNN 策略函数逼近方法来解决该问题。

Result: αRGNN 能够完全消除深度速率衰落，并显著优化用户速率变异性，同时保持足够的遍历性能。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于 CVaR 的方法和 αRGNN 能够有效解决 MISO 网络中的加权和速率最大化和用户速率可靠性问题。

Abstract: We consider the problem of maximizing weighted sum rate in a multiple-input
single-output (MISO) downlink wireless network with emphasis on user rate
reliability. We introduce a novel risk-aggregated formulation of the complex
WSR maximization problem, which utilizes the Conditional Value-at-Risk (CVaR)
as a functional for enforcing rate (ultra)-reliability over channel fading
uncertainty/risk. We establish a WMMSE-like equivalence between the proposed
precoding problem and a weighted risk-averse MSE problem, enabling us to design
a tailored unfolded graph neural network (GNN) policy function approximation
(PFA), named {\alpha}-Robust Graph Neural Network ({\alpha}RGNN), trained to
maximize lower-tail (CVaR) rates resulting from adverse wireless channel
realizations (e.g., deep fading, attenuation). We empirically demonstrate that
a trained {\alpha}RGNN fully eliminates per user deep rate fades, and
substantially and optimally reduces statistical user rate variability while
retaining adequate ergodic performance.

</details>


### [436] [Transmitter-Side Beyond-Diagonal RIS-Enabled Integrated Sensing and Communications](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26333)
*Kexin Chen,Yijie Mao,Wonjae Shin*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种集成传感与通信（ISAC）框架，该框架在发射端集成了超越对角重构智能超表面（BD-RIS），以提高6G无线网络的性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了在6G无线网络中实现更高级别的电磁波控制，并为通信和传感提供增强性能，同时减少对大型全数字射频链的需求。

Method: 提出了一种新的ISAC框架，该框架在发射端集成了BD-RIS。通过优化有源波束形成和BD-RIS散射矩阵来最小化传感目标的Cramér-Rao下界（CRB）并最大化通信用户的总和速率（SR）。提出了一种低复杂度的迭代算法来解决耦合优化问题，该算法将子问题转化为具有闭式解的可行投影问题。

Result: 与传统的对角RIS辅助ISAC相比，BD-RIS辅助ISAC在增强传感和通信性能方面表现出优越的能力。此外，与经典的迭代算法相比，所提出的算法在提高双功能性能的同时，显著降低了计算复杂度。

Conclusion: 在发射端部署BD-RIS是一种有效的方法，可以增强ISAC系统的传感和通信能力，同时降低系统复杂度和计算成本。

Abstract: Beyond diagonal reconfigurable intelligent surfaces (BD-RIS) have emerged as
a promising technology for 6G wireless networks, offering more advanced control
over electromagnetic wave propagation than conventional diagonal RIS. This
paper proposes a novel integrated sensing and communication (ISAC) framework
that incorporates BD-RIS at the transmitter. This not only opens the door to
enhanced sensing and communication performance, but also alleviates the need
for large-scale fully digital radio frequency (RF) chains at the transmitter.
Based on the proposed system model, we formulate a normalized weighted
optimization problem to jointly design the active beamforming and the BD-RIS
scattering matrix with the aim of jointly minimizing the trace of the
Cram\'er-Rao bound (CRB) for sensing targets and maximizing the sum rate (SR)
for communication users. To address this highly coupled optimization problem,
we propose a novel and low-complexity iterative algorithm that efficiently
solves the active beamforming and scattering matrix subproblems by transforming
each into a series of tractable projection problems with closed-form solutions.
Numerical results show the appealing capability of the transmitter-side
BD-RIS-aided ISAC over conventional diagonal RIS-aided ISAC in enhancing both
sensing and communication performance. Moreover, compared to the classic
iterative algorithm, the proposed algorithm offers enhanced dual-functional
performance while significantly reducing the computational complexity.

</details>


### [437] [A Physics-Informed Multi-Source Domain Adaptation Framework for Label-Free Post-Earthquake Damage Assessment](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26356)
*Yifeng Zhang,Xiao Liang*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 提出一个无需损伤标签的物理信息多源域适应框架，用于预测目标建筑的震后结构损伤。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统监督学习方法需要大量标注数据，这对于获取震后损伤结构的数据不切实际，因此提出此框架来解决数据稀疏性问题。

Method: 该框架首先分析各域关键物理相似性以形成权重矩阵，然后提取多源和目标域特征并输入分类器和判别器，最后在对抗训练中应用关键参数矩阵作为权重来优化各源域特征的贡献。

Result: 该框架能够对震后结构损伤进行评估，尤其是在标记数据稀少的情况下，显著提高了震后损伤评估的能力。

Conclusion: 所提出的框架为评估结构损伤提供了一个鲁棒的解决方案，特别是在标记数据稀少的情况下，显著提高了震后损伤评估的能力。

Abstract: Efficient and intelligent assessment of post-earthquake structural damage is
critical for rapid disaster response. While data-driven approaches have shown
promise, traditional supervised learning methods rely on extensive labeled
datasets, which are often impractical to obtain for damaged structures. To
address this limitation, we propose a physics-informed multi-source domain
adaptation framework to predict post-earthquake structural damage for a target
building without requiring damage labels. The multi-source domain integrates
actual damage data and numerical modeling data from buildings similar to the
target structure. The framework operates through three key steps. First, the
similarity of key physics from each domain are analyzed to form a weight
matrix, which enhances domain differentiation. Second, features from the
multi-source and target domains are extracted and fed into a classifier and a
discriminator. The classifier ensures that the features are damage-sensitive
and accurately assign damage states, while the discriminator enforces that the
features remain domain-invariant. Finally, the key parameters matrix is applied
as weights during adversarial training to optimize the contribution of features
from each source domain. The proposed framework provides a robust solution for
assessing structural damage in scenarios where labeled data is scarce,
significantly advancing the capabilities of post-earthquake damage evaluation.

</details>


### [438] [A solution to the mystery of the sub-harmonic series and to the combination tone via a linear mathematical model of the cochlea](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26395)
*Ugo Boscain,Xiangyu Ma,Dario Prandi,Giuseppina Turco*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一个简单的线性耳蜗模型，将耳蜗视为一组振动的弦，并假设传递给听觉皮层的信息是弦中储存的能量。研究考虑了弦的所有振动模式，并展示了亚谐波系列的出现，这可能解释了小三和弦的和谐。此外，研究还利用能量的非线性来研究组合音（塔蒂尼第三音）的出现，为这一长期争论的课题提供了新的见解。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本研究的动机是模拟耳蜗的工作原理，特别是信息如何从耳蜗传递到听觉皮层，以及解释和弦和谐和小三和弦的和谐等声学现象。

Method: 本研究采用了一个简单的线性耳蜗模型，将耳蜗模拟为一组振动的弦。研究人员考虑了弦的所有振动模式，并分析了弦中储存的能量。在此基础上，他们推导出了亚谐波系列的出现，并研究了能量的非线性如何导致组合音的产生。

Result: 研究表明，耳蜗模型可以产生亚谐波系列，这可能解释了小三和弦的和谐。此外，研究还发现能量的非线性可以用来解释组合音（塔蒂尼第三音）的产生。

Conclusion: 本研究提出的耳蜗模型能够解释亚谐波系列和小三和弦的和谐，并为组合音的产生提供了新的见解。这为理解听觉感知和声学现象提供了新的视角。

Abstract: In this paper, we study a simple linear model of the cochlea as a set of
vibrating strings. We make hypothesis that the information sent to the auditory
cortex is the energy stored in the strings and consider all oscillation modes
of the strings. We show the emergence of the sub-harmonic series whose
existence was hypothesized in the XVI century to explain the consonance of the
minor chord. We additionally show how the nonlinearity of the energy can be
used to study the emergence of the combination tone (Tartini's third sound)
shedding new light on this long debated subject.

</details>


### [439] [Indoor/Outdoor Spectrum Sharing Enabled by GNSS-based Classifiers](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26500)
*Hossein Nasiri,Muhammad Iqbal Rochman,Monisha Ghosh*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 联邦和商业应用对中频段（1-10 GHz）的需求，加上室内应用（如工厂自动化）的增长，促使了一种新的频谱共享方法：户外联邦部门使用的频段可供室内商业用户重复使用。6 GHz频段（5.925-7.125 GHz）是近期商业系统间共享的一个例子，其中无执照的室内低功耗（LPI）用户与户外在位者（主要是固定的微波链路）共享该频段。然而，目前没有可靠的自动方法来确定设备是在室内还是室外，因此需要采用其他机制，例如强制室内接入点（AP）使用集成天线并且不依赖电池供电，以及降低可能在室外的客户端设备的发射功率。精确的室内/室外（I/O）分类可以解决这些挑战，从而在不干扰在位者的情况下自动调整发射功率。为此，我们利用全球导航卫星系统（GNSS）信号进行I/O分类。GNSS信号在设计上本身就用于室外接收，并且极易受到室内衰减和阻塞的影响，这为环境传感提供了可靠且显著的特征。我们开发了各种方法，包括基于阈值的方法和机器学习方法，并使用从不同地理位置收集的扩展数据集对它们进行了评估。我们的结果表明，仅基于GNSS的方法在不熟悉的地点比仅依赖无线（Wi-Fi）数据的方法具有更高的准确性。此外，将GNSS数据与Wi-Fi信息相结合可以提高分类准确性，展示了多模式数据融合的显著优势。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的频谱共享方法（如在6 GHz频段）面临室内/室外（I/O）设备区分困难的问题，导致无法自动调整发射功率，可能干扰户外在位者。需要一种可靠的自动方法来区分室内外设备，以实现更有效的频谱共享。

Method: 利用全球导航卫星系统（GNSS）信号的室内衰减和阻塞特性，开发基于GNSS信号的室内/室外（I/O）分类方法。比较了基于阈值和机器学习的方法，并评估了GNSS数据与Wi-Fi数据结合使用的效果。

Result: 基于GNSS的方法在不熟悉的地点比仅依赖Wi-Fi的方法具有更高的准确性。结合GNSS和Wi-Fi数据可以进一步提高分类准确性。

Conclusion: GNSS信号为室内/室外（I/O）分类提供了一种强大而准确的方法，并且与Wi-Fi数据结合使用可以实现最佳性能，从而为更有效的频谱共享铺平了道路。

Abstract: The desirability of the mid-band frequency range (1 - 10 GHz) for federal and
commercial applications, combined with the growing applications for commercial
indoor use-cases, such as factory automation, opens up a new approach to
spectrum sharing: the same frequency bands used outdoors by federal incumbents
can be reused by commercial indoor users. A recent example of such sharing,
between commercial systems, is the 6 GHz band (5.925 - 7.125 GHz) where
unlicensed, low-power-indoor (LPI) users share the band with outdoor
incumbents, primarily fixed microwave links. However, to date, there exist no
reliable, automatic means of determining whether a device is indoors or
outdoors, necessitating the use of other mechanisms such as mandating indoor
access points (APs) to have integrated antennas and not be battery powered, and
reducing transmit power of client devices which may be outdoors. An accurate
indoor/outdoor (I/O) classification addresses these challenges, enabling
automatic transmit power adjustments without interfering with incumbents. To
this end, we leverage the Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) signals for
I/O classification. GNSS signals, designed inherently for outdoor reception and
highly susceptible to indoor attenuation and blocking, provide a robust and
distinguishing feature for environmental sensing. We develop various
methodologies, including threshold-based techniques and machine learning
approaches and evaluate them using an expanded dataset gathered from diverse
geographical locations. Our results demonstrate that GNSS-based methods alone
can achieve greater accuracy than approaches relying solely on wireless (Wi-Fi)
data, particularly in unfamiliar locations. Furthermore, the integration of
GNSS data with Wi-Fi information leads to improved classification accuracy,
showcasing the significant benefits of multi-modal data fusion.

</details>


### [440] [Neural Network-Based Single-Carrier Joint Communication and Sensing: Loss Design, Constellation Shaping and Precoding](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26508)
*Charlotte Muth,Benedikt Geiger,Daniel Gil Gaviria,Laurent Schmalen*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 该研究探讨了高阶调制格式对单载波联合通信与传感(JCAS)系统传感性能的影响，并提出了一种基于神经网络的系统，通过使用克拉美-罗界和互信息作为损失函数，在低信噪比下实现了优于传统算法的传感性能，并展示了其在多用户MIMO系统中的扩展潜力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究JCAS系统中的高阶调制格式对传感性能的影响，并提出一种基于神经网络的系统以提升性能。

Method: 实现了一个包含波束形成器、调制器、目标检测器、到达角(AoA)估计器和通信解调器的可训练神经网络。比较了几何形状调制格式和经典QAM的性能，并评估了多快照传感和信噪比对系统性能的影响。使用克拉美-罗界和互信息作为损失函数来改善训练行为。

Result: 基于神经网络的传感系统在低信噪比下，无论使用训练过的星座图还是QAM，其目标检测和AoA估计性能均优于传统的 Neyman-Pearson 功率检测器和 ESPRIT 算法。多快照传感可以显著缩小经典和形状调制格式之间的传感性能差距。将系统扩展到多用户 MIMO 可提高空间效率。

Conclusion: 基于神经网络的 JCAS 系统，特别是当利用高阶调制格式并结合多快照传感时，在低信噪比下能实现优于传统方法的传感性能。估计界在训练神经网络时至关重要，尤其是在变化的信噪比条件下。

Abstract: We investigate the impact of higher-order modulation formats on the sensing
performance of single-carrier joint communication and sensing (JCAS) systems.
Several separate components such as a beamformer, a modulator, a target
detector, an angle of arrival (AoA) estimator and a communication demapper are
implemented as trainable neural networks (NNs). We compare geometrically shaped
modulation formats to a classical quadrature amplitude modulation (QAM) scheme.
We assess the influence of multi-snapshot sensing and varying signal-to-noise
ratio (SNR) on the overall performance of the autoencoder-based system. To
improve the training behavior of the system, we decouple the loss functions
from the respective SNR values and the number of sensing snapshots, using upper
bounds of the sensing and communication performance, namely the Cram\'er-Rao
bound for AoA estimation and the mutual information for communication. The
NN-based sensing outperforms classical algorithms, such as a Neyman-Pearson
based power detector for object detection and ESPRIT for AoA estimation for
both the trained constellations and QAM at low SNRs. We show that the gap in
sensing performance between classical and shaped modulation formats can be
significantly reduced through multi-snapshot sensing. Lastly, we demonstrate
system extension to multi-user multiple-input multiple-output to address the
improvement of spatial efficiency when servicing multiple user equipments. Our
contribution emphasizes the importance of estimation bounds for training neural
networks, especially when the trained solutions are deployed in varying SNR
conditions.

</details>


### [441] [Secure ISAC with Fluid Antenna Systems: Joint Precoding and Port Selection](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26572)
*Abdelhamid Salem,Hao Xu,Kai-Kit Wong,Chan-Byoung Chae,Yangyang Zhang*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本文提出一种利用流体天线系统（FAS）的可重构性来增强集成传感与通信（ISAC）系统物理层安全性的新框架。联合预编码和端口选择（JPPS）策略被提议用于最大化总保密速率，同时确保雷达传感的可靠性。该问题通过结合分数规划（FP）变换和逐次凸近似（SCA）的迭代算法进行数学建模和求解。为降低计算复杂度，还开发了基于零强制（ZF）预编码的低复杂度方案，并结合了贪婪端口选择和迹-逆最小化。仿真结果表明，在各种FAS端口、用户负载和传感目标下，与传统基线相比，保密性能和传感精度均得到显著提高。这些发现强调了FAS几何优化在实现下一代无线网络安全高效的联合通信-传感中的关键作用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: ISAC系统中的物理层安全增强是关键问题，但现有方法存在不足。本研究旨在通过利用流体天线（FAS）的可重构性来提升ISAC系统的安全性。

Method: 提出联合预编码和端口选择（JPPS）策略，使用分数规划（FP）和逐次凸近似（SCA）的迭代算法求解。同时，开发了基于零强制（ZF）预编码的低复杂度方案。

Result: 仿真结果表明，所提方法在保密性能和传感精度上均优于传统基线，并且在不同FAS端口、用户负载和传感目标下表现稳定。

Conclusion: FAS的可重构性及其几何优化对于实现ISAC系统的安全和高效至关重要，为下一代无线网络提供了新的解决方案。

Abstract: This paper presents a novel framework for enhancing physical-layer security
in integrated sensing and communication (ISAC) systems by leveraging the
reconfigurability of fluid antenna systems (FAS). We propose a joint precoding
and port selection (JPPS) strategy that maximizes the sum secrecy rate while
simultaneously ensuring reliable radar sensing. The problem is formulated using
fractional programming (FP) and solved through an iterative algorithm that
integrates FP transformations with successive convex approximation (SCA). To
reduce computational complexity, we further develop low-complexity schemes
based on zero-forcing (ZF) precoding, combined with greedy port selection and
trace-inverse minimization. Simulation results demonstrate substantial
improvements in both secrecy performance and sensing accuracy compared to
conventional baselines, across a wide range of FAS ports, user loads, and
sensing targets. These findings highlight the critical importance of FAS
geometry optimization in enabling secure and efficient joint
communication-sensing for next-generation wireless networks.

</details>


### [442] [Statistical Inference Framework for Extended Target Detection in mmWave Automotive Radar](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26573)
*Vinay Kulkarni,V. V. Reddy,Neha Maheshwari*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本论文提出了一种基于距离-多普勒（RD）分段的框架，用于更好地检测和表征毫米波雷达中的扩展目标（如汽车），克服了传统CFAR算法忽略目标散射结构的缺点。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统CFAR算法将来自单个汽车的多个散射体视为独立检测，忽略了目标固有的空间散射结构。

Method: 提出了一种距离-多普勒（RD）分段框架来描述汽车的典型散射特征，并使用最大似然估计（MLE）和马尔可夫链蒙特卡洛（MCMC）采样进行统计建模。基于估计模型，引入了基于偏度（skewness）的检验统计量来进行二元假设分类，并提出了一个结合交并比（IoU）和基于峰值响应的分段中心化的检测流程，优化用于单次驻留。

Result: 通过模拟和真实数据集的广泛评估，证明了该方法在提高检测精度方面的有效性。

Conclusion: 所提出的RD分段框架结合统计建模和新颖的检测流程，能够有效保留并利用扩展目标的散射结构信息，显著提高了汽车雷达应用的检测精度。

Abstract: Millimeter wave (mmWave) radar systems, owing to their large bandwidth,
provide fine range resolution that enables the observation of multiple
scatterers originating from a single automotive target commonly referred to as
an extended target. Conventional CFAR-based detection algorithms typically
treat these scatterers as independent detections, thereby discarding the
spatial scattering structure intrinsic to the target. To preserve this
scattering spread, this paper proposes a Range-Doppler (RD) segment framework
designed to encapsulate the typical scattering profile of an automobile. The
statistical characterization of the segment is performed using Maximum
Likelihood Estimation (MLE) and posterior density modeling facilitated through
Gibbs Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) sampling. A skewness-based test
statistic, derived from the estimated statistical model, is introduced for
binary hypothesis classification of extended targets. Additionally, the paper
presents a detection pipeline that incorporates Intersection over Union (IoU)
and segment centering based on peak response, optimized to work within a single
dwell. Extensive evaluations using both simulated and real-world datasets
demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed approach, underscoring its
suitability for automotive radar applications through improved detection
accuracy.

</details>


<div id='cond-mat.mes-hall'></div>

# cond-mat.mes-hall [[Back]](#toc)

### [443] [Topological non-Abelian Gauge Structures in Cayley-Schreier Lattices](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25316)
*Zoltán Guba,Robert-Jan Slager,Lavi K. Upreti,Tomáš Bzdušek*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: Cayley-Schreier lattices can realize arbitrary gauge fields and non-Abelian gauge structures, which can be interpreted as spin model blocks with various topological invariants. This has potential applications in synthetic crystals and topological insulators.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The paper aims to explore the potential of Cayley-Schreier lattices for realizing arbitrary gauge fields and non-Abelian gauge structures in synthetic crystals, and to demonstrate their interpretability as spin model blocks with diverse topological invariants.

Method: The paper theoretically investigates Cayley-Schreier lattices, showing how they can give rise to implementable lattice systems with non-Abelian gauge structures and space-group symmetry. Concrete models are presented to illustrate these general results and their potential experimental implementation.

Result: Cayley-Schreier lattices can naturally lead to lattice systems with non-Abelian gauge structures that transform into space-group symmetry. The symmetry sectors can be interpreted as blocks of spin models, effectively realizing a variety of topological invariants in a single setup.

Conclusion: Cayley-Schreier lattices provide a promising platform for realizing complex gauge structures and topological invariants in synthetic materials, opening avenues for the study of topological insulators and metals with non-Abelian gauge structures.

Abstract: Recently, novel crystalline constructions known as Cayley-Schreier lattices
have been suggested as a platform for realizing arbitrary gauge fields in
synthetic crystals with real hopping amplitudes. We show that Cayley-Schreier
lattices can naturally give rise to implementable lattice systems that
incorporate non-Abelian gauge structures transforming into a space-group
symmetry. We show that the symmetry sectors can, moreover, be interpreted as
blocks of spin models that can effectively realize a wealth of different
topological invariants in a single setup. We underpin these general results
with concrete models and show how they can be implemented in current
experimental platforms. Our work sets the stage for a systematic investigation
of topological insulators and metals with non-Abelian gauge structures.

</details>


### [444] [Chiral charge conservation and ballistic magnetotransport in a disordered Weyl semimetal](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25330)
*A. A. Burkov*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 在理想的 Weyl  கருத金屬中，由於弱的節點間散射可忽略，手徵電荷（幾乎）精確守恆。這導致了一個可觀測的實驗效應：在外加磁場下，沿磁場方向的電荷傳輸是純粹彈道的，電導率為每個磁通量量子 $e^2/h$。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 證明在理想 Weyl  கருத金屬中，手徵電荷的守恆及其導致的實驗效應。

Method: 理論分析 Weyl  கருத金屬中的電荷傳輸，特別是節點間散射和磁場的影響。

Result: 發現弱的節點間散射是可忽略的，手徵電荷幾乎守恆，並且在磁場下，沿磁場的傳輸是純粹彈道的，電導率為 $e^2/h$。

Conclusion: Weyl 和 Dirac  கருத金屬中的非平凡拓撲結構的最強實驗表現是，在外加磁場下，沿磁場方向的電導率為 $e^2/h$。

Abstract: We demonstrate that in an ideal Weyl semimetal, in which the Fermi energy
coincides with the band-touching nodes, weak direct inter-nodal scattering is
irrelevant and, as a result, the chiral charge is (almost) exactly conserved.
This leads to an experimentally-observable effect: in an applied magnetic
field, the charge transport along the field becomes purely ballistic, with the
conductance given by $e^2/h$ per magnetic flux quantum through the sample
cross-section. This is the strongest experimental manifestation of nontrivial
topology in Weyl and Dirac semimetals.

</details>


### [445] [Quantum geometric origins of the orbital degrees of freedom of hybrid bosonic quasiparticles in magnetic systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25635)
*D. Quang To,Dai Q. Ho,Joshua M. O. Zide,Lars Gundlach,M. Benjamin Jungfleisch,Garnett W. Bryant,Anderson Janotti,Matthew F. Doty*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 研究了玻色子系统中轨道角动量（OAM）的起源和机制，并提出了一种探测方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了理解和利用玻色子系统中的轨道自由度，特别是其中的OAM。

Method: 研究了两种OAM的来源：全局旋转运动和量子几何；重点研究了量子几何效应在二维反铁磁系统中强耦合的磁振子-声子系统中的表现，并通过时间反演对称性破缺和带间耦合机制揭示了有限OAM的产生。

Result: 发现了由量子几何效应产生的有限OAM，并提出了基于横向电压的探测方案，可以用于实验探测玻色子轨道自由度。

Conclusion: 研究为新兴的声子轨道电子学奠定了基础，连接了声子和磁振子轨道电子学，并为理解磁振子-极化子提供了工具，同时为利用玻色子系统的轨道自由度以及实现磁化和声子传输的电控提供了新的途径。

Abstract: The orbital degree of freedom has recently attracted significant attention
due to the novel phenomena it enables in condensed matter systems. However, the
interpretation of the orbital degree of freedom in bosonic quasiparticles
remains conceptually ambiguous and the mechanisms governing the transfer of
orbital angular moment (OAM) between distinct quasiparticles, such as magnons
and phonons, are not yet fully understood. We investigate orbital dynamics in
bosonic systems and identify two origins of OAM: (i) global rotational motion
of the system, and (ii) the quantum geometry of wavefunctions. Focusing on the
latter, we study strongly coupled magnon-phonon systems in two-dimensional
antiferromagnets as a test case. We uncover finite OAM arising from quantum
geometric effects via two mechanisms: (a) time-parity symmetry breaking,
yielding intra band OAM, and (b) interband coupling, generating interband OAM.
We propose that an electrical detection scheme based on the transverse voltage
generated by hybrid magnon phonon modes can be used to experimentally probe the
bosonic orbital degree of freedom. Our results establish a foundation for the
emerging field of phonon orbitronics, providing both a conceptual bridge
between phonon and magnon orbitronics and a tool for better understanding
magnon-polarons. They also advance a unified framework for harnessing orbital
degrees of freedom in bosonic systems and pave the way toward electrical
control of magnetization and phononic transport.

</details>


### [446] [Electric-field control of pure spin photocurrent in germanene](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25691)
*Yaqing Yang,Zhen Zhang,Liwen Zhang,Liantuan Xiao,Suotang Jia,Jun Chen,Lei Zhang*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 通过门电场调控二维材料中的纯自旋光电流。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在由非磁性元素组成的、时间反转对称的系统中，纯自旋流的电学控制仍然是一个核心挑战，因为自旋和电场之间只有间接相互作用。

Method: 提出了一个理论框架，用于通过门电场调控具有时间反转对称性的二维材料中的纯自旋光电流。理论分析表明，在具有自旋-轨道耦合和面内镜像对称的系统中，面外电场会在费米能级附近的能带结构中引起自旋劈裂和反转，从而实现纯自旋光电流的大小控制和方向反转。对锗烯进行了第一性原理计算以验证该机制。

Result: 在锗烯中，外加电场的方向反转会导致纯自旋光电流的方向反转。此外，纯自旋光电流可以通过改变光子能量和光的入射角度进行调控。

Conclusion: 该研究建立了一种在二维材料中进行电场控制的纯自旋输运的鲁棒策略，为光自旋电子器件的发展提供了新的可能性。

Abstract: The electrical control of pure spin current remains a central challenge in
spintronics, particularly in time-reversal symmetric systems composed of
nonmagnetic elements, where spin and electric fields interact only indirectly.
In this work, we develop a theoretical framework for electrically tuning pure
spin photocurrent in two-dimensional materials with time-reversal symmetry via
a gate electric field. Through theoretical analysis, we demonstrate that in
systems with spin-orbit coupling and in-plane mirror symmetry, an out-of-plane
electric field induces spin splitting and reversal in the band structure near
the Fermi energy, enabling magnitude control and direction reversal of the pure
spin photocurrent. To validate this mechanism, we perform first-principles
calculations on germanene, an experimentally realized two-dimensional material.
Beyond amplitude modulation, we reveal that reversing the direction of the
applied electric field leads to a corresponding reversal of the pure spin
photocurrent. Furthermore, we show that the pure spin photocurrent can be tuned
by varying the photon energy and the incident angle of light, providing
additional degrees of control over spin transport. These findings establish a
robust strategy for electric-field-controlled pure spin transport in
two-dimensional materials, offering new possibilities for the development of
optospintronic devices.

</details>


### [447] [From Shapiro steps to photon-assisted tunneling in microwave-driven atomic-scale Josephson junctions with a single (magnetic) adatom](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26228)
*Martina Trahms,Bharti Mahendru,Clemens B. Winkelmann,Katharina J. Franke*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 超小尺寸的约瑟夫森结易受噪声和阻尼影响，这会抑制相位相干性。本研究使用扫描隧道显微镜在微波激励下研究了原子尺度约瑟夫森结的相干特性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究超小尺寸约瑟夫森结的相干特性，特别是噪声、阻尼以及磁性吸附原子对相干性的影响，以理解相干到非相干转变的机制。

Method: 在扫描隧道显微镜下，对铅-铅约瑟夫森结进行微波激励，并研究了不同交流幅度下的 Shapiro 阶梯行为。引入磁性吸附原子后，重复上述实验并分析其对约瑟夫森耦合能量、准粒子隧穿以及相干性的影响。

Result: 普通铅-铅结表现出具有迟滞的 Shapiro 阶梯，表明存在相干共振态。增加交流幅度会因热涨落增加而降低相干性。引入磁性吸附原子后，约瑟夫森耦合能量降低，准粒子隧穿增强。在交流驱动下，观察到相干性迅速被抑制，这归因于通过 Yu-Shiba-Rusinov 态的光子辅助准粒子隧穿。

Conclusion: 研究结果证实了原子尺度约瑟夫森结中存在相位相干性，并揭示了向非相干传输转变的机制，强调了在纳米尺度超导器件中控制耗散的重要性。

Abstract: Ultra-small Josephson junctions are strongly influenced by noise and damping
due to energy dissipation into the environment, which are expected to suppress
phase coherence. Here, we investigate the coherence properties of atomic-scale
Josephson junctions in a scanning tunneling microscope under microwave
excitation. Plain Pb-Pb junctions exhibit hysteretic Shapiro steps as signature
of a coherent resonant state. With increasing AC amplitude, phase coherence is
reduced due to an increase of thermal fluctuations. In the presence of magnetic
adatoms the Josephson coupling energy is reduced and quasi-particle tunneling
is enhanced. With AC driving we observe a rapid suppression of coherence that
we ascribe to photon-assisted quasi-particle tunneling through Yu-Shiba-Rusinov
states. Our results highlight the presence of phase coherence and shed light on
the origin of the transition to incoherent transport, thereby revealing the
importance of controlling dissipation in nanoscale superconducting devices.

</details>


### [448] [Why is topology hard to learn?](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26261)
*D. O. Oriekhov,Stan Bergkamp,Guliuxin Jin,Juan Daniel Torres Luna,Badr Zouggari,Sibren van der Meer,Naoual El Yazidi,Eliska Greplova*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 通过构建混合张量-神经网络模型，研究了机器学习在拓扑相位分类中的应用，并评估了其可训练性和泛化能力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 机器学习在物理学中的应用引起了广泛关注，但其可解释性方面的挑战使得人们对其学习物理概念的能力存在疑问。本研究旨在解决这一问题，特别是在拓扑相位分类这一神经网络的原始物理应用背景下。

Method: 构建了一个混合张量-神经网络模型，该模型能够精确表示实空间拓扑不变量，并对其可训练性和泛化能力进行了严格评估。通过将该模型与多种类型的神经网络进行基准测试，以例证其在可训练性和表征能力上的差异。

Result: 研究结果表明，与多种类型的神经网络相比，所提出的张量-神经网络在准确性和可训练性方面表现优异，突显了其在学习拓扑不变量方面的优势。

Conclusion: 本研究强调了学习拓扑不变量所面临的挑战，并为在凝聚态物理学中实现更准确、泛化能力更强的机器学习表征奠定了基础。

Abstract: Much attention has been devoted to the use of machine learning to approximate
physical concepts. Yet, due to challenges in interpretability of machine
learning techniques, the question of what physics machine learning models are
able to learn remains open. Here we bridge the concept a physical quantity and
its machine learning approximation in the context of the original application
of neural networks in physics: topological phase classification. We construct a
hybrid tensor-neural network object that exactly expresses real space
topological invariant and rigorously assess its trainability and
generalization. Specifically, we benchmark the accuracy and trainability of a
tensor-neural network to multiple types of neural networks, thus exemplifying
the differences in trainability and representational power. Our work highlights
the challenges in learning topological invariants and constitutes a stepping
stone towards more accurate and better generalizable machine learning
representations in condensed matter physics.

</details>


### [449] [Néel vector and Rashba SOC effects on RKKY interaction in 2D $d$-wave altermagnets](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26285)
*Hou-Jian Duan,Miao-Sheng Fang,Ming-Xun Deng,Ruiqiang Wang*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 研究了二维d波形磁体中的RKKY相互作用，重点关注Néel矢量方向和SOC对磁相互作用的影响，并发现了新的Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya相互作用分量。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究SOC如何影响磁体性质，并确定Néel矢量的方向，这对于信息存储至关重要。

Method: 通过独立改变Néel矢量方向和SOC强度，研究了二维d波形磁体中的RKKY相互作用。

Result: 证明了可以通过Ising项（无SOC）或DM项（有SOC）来确定Néel矢量方向。发现了由磁异构体和SOC协同作用产生的新型DM相互作用分量。通过调节SOC强度，揭示了由五种不同机制决定的RKKY自旋模型的演化。

Conclusion: 研究结果为理解磁异构体的磁性质提供了新的见解，克服了以往研究的局限性。

Abstract: Altermagnets possess two key features: non-relativistic alternating spin
splitting (i.e., altermagnetism) and a material-dependent N\'{e}el vector. The
former naturally coexists with Rashba spin-orbit coupling (SOC) in real
materials on substrates, prompting the question of how SOC affects the magnetic
properties of altermagnets. The latter is crucial for information storage,
making it essential to determine its orientation. To address these issues, we
study the Ruderman-Kittel-Kasuya-Yosida (RKKY) interaction in two-dimensional
(2D) $d$-wave altermagnets by independently varying the N\'{e}el vector
orientation and the SOC strength. Our results demonstrate that the N\'{e}el
vector orientation can be accurately determined via the Ising term without SOC,
or qualitatively inferred via the DM terms with SOC. Moreover, we observe a
novel Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya (DM) component distinct from previous reports,
whose emergence is attributed to the synergy between altermagnetism and SOC.
Additionally, through tuning SOC strength, we reveal the evolution of the RKKY
spin models governed by five distinct mechanisms: the spin model may be
determined solely by altermagnetism, solely by SOC, or solely by the kinetic
term; alternatively, altermagnetism may coincidentally yield the same
moderately anisotropic spin model as SOC, or compete with SOC to produce a spin
model with maximal anisotropy. Beyond SOC strength, which mechanism operates
also relies on the N\'{e}el vector orientation and impurity configurations. All
results are numerically verified. These findings -- which were inaccessible in
prior studies due to the limitations of first-order SOC expansion and fixed
N\'{e}el vector orientation -- provide important new insights into the magnetic
properties of altermagnets.

</details>


### [450] [Efficient heat-energy conversion from a non-thermal Tomonaga-Luttinger liquid](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26387)
*Hikaru Yamazaki,Masashi Uemura,Haruhi Tanaka,Tokuro Hata,Chaojing Lin,Takafumi Akiho,Koji Muraki,Toshimasa Fujisawa*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 本研究展示了如何利用量子霍尔效应中的汤木拿-卢丁格液体（TL液体）的非热态来进行能量收集，该方法有望超越传统热力学极限。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统能量收集技术受卡诺效率等热力学极限的限制，而利用非热力学平衡态的量子热机有望突破这些限制。

Method: 提出了一种利用量子霍尔效应中的TL液体的非热态进行能量收集的方案，并使用量子点能量收集器对该方案进行了测试。量子点能量收集器从量子点接触晶体管提供的热量中获取能量，并作用于非热TL液体。

Result: 与准热力学平衡TL液体相比，在相同热量条件下，非热TL液体状态能够产生更大的电动势和更高的转换效率。

Conclusion: TL液体作为一种优良的非热载流子，在能量收集方面具有巨大潜力。

Abstract: Energy harvesting is a technique that generates useful work from waste heat.
Conventional energy harvesters acting on local thermal equilibrium states are
constrained by thermodynamic limits, such as the Carnot efficiency. Quantum
heat engines with non-thermal reservoirs are expected to exceed such limits.
Here, we demonstrate energy harvesting from a nonthermal Tomonaga-Luttinger
(TL) liquid in quantum Hall edge channels, where the non-thermal state is
naturally formed due to the absence of thermalization. The scheme is tested
with a quantum-dot energy harvester working on a non-thermal TL liquid supplied
with waste heat from a quantum-point-contact transistor. Compared to the
quasi-thermalized TL liquid, the non-thermal state prepared under the same heat
is capable of a larger electromotive force and higher conversion efficiency.
These characteristics can be understood by considering a binary Fermi
distribution function of the non-thermal state induced by entropy-conserving
equilibration. TL liquids are attractive non-thermal carriers for excellent
energy harvesting.

</details>


### [451] [Memristor-Driven Spike Encoding for Fully Implantable Cochlear Implants](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26582)
*Tímea Nóra Török,Roland Kövecs,Ferenc Braun,Zsigmond Pollner,Tamás Zeffer,Nguyen Quoc Khánh,László Pósa,Péter Révész,Heungsoo Kim,Alberto Piqué,András Halbritter,János Volk*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 利用基于VO2纳米压电MEMS振荡器和Mott忆阻器的听觉传感单元，实现了具有频率选择性的振动检测和神经脉冲波形发射。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 利用人工神经元电路（特别是Mott忆阻器）的神经动力学行为，为人工传感提供多样化的应用前景，尤其是在全植入式耳蜗植入体领域，因其体积小、能量效率高。

Method: 提出并实现了一个由压电MEMS悬臂梁连接VO2纳米压电Mott忆阻器振荡器电路组成的听觉传感单元，能够进行频率选择性的振动检测并发出神经脉冲波形。

Result: 在生物学实际振动幅度下，该听觉传感单元能够进行频率选择性振动检测，并发出神经脉冲波形。实验证明了其脉冲发放率编码输入刺激的能力，并展示了输出脉冲发放频率和波形形状的可调性，使其能够产生适用于神经系统的电压脉冲。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于Mott忆阻器的听觉传感单元能够模拟自然听觉过程，通过脉冲发放率编码振动刺激，并产生可调的、适用于神经系统的输出信号，为开发人工传感应用提供了有前景的解决方案。

Abstract: Neurodynamic behavior of artificial neuron circuits made of Mott memristors
provides versatile opportunities to utilize them for artificial sensing. Their
small size and energy efficiency of generating spiking electrical signals
enable usage in fully implantable cochlear implants. Here, we propose an
auditory sensing unit realized by a piezo-MEMS (micro-electromechanical
systems) cantilever connected to a VO$_2$ nanogap Mott memristor-based
oscillator circuit. This auditory sensing unit is capable of
frequency-selective detection of vibrations and subsequent emission of a neural
spiking waveform. The auditory sensing unit is tested under biologically
realistic vibration amplitudes, and spike rate-encoding of the incoming
stimulus is demonstrated, similarly to natural hearing processes. The
tunability of the output spiking frequency and the shape of the spiking
waveform are also demonstrated to provide suitable voltage spikes for the
nervous system.

</details>


<div id='cs.AR'></div>

# cs.AR [[Back]](#toc)

### [452] [smallNet: Implementation of a convolutional layer in tiny FPGAs](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25391)
*Fernanda Zapata Bascuñán,Alan Ezequiel Fuster*

Main category: cs.AR

TL;DR: 一个完全用Verilog编写的卷积层，名为smallNet，在FPGA上实现了5.1倍的速度提升，超过81%的分类准确率，并且功耗仅为1.5W，适用于资源受限的嵌入式应用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 开发一个完全用Verilog编写的卷积层，以实现比基于Python的库更快的速度和更低的功耗，并能在各种硬件平台上轻松部署。

Method: 完全用Verilog编写了一个卷积层（smallNet），基于滤波器多项式结构，并在Cora Z7单核上进行了验证。

Result: smallNet实现了5.1倍的速度提升，超过81%的分类准确率，总功耗为1.5W。

Conclusion: 该研究成功地开发了一个用Verilog编写的卷积层（smallNet），证明了其在实时、资源受限的嵌入式应用中的可行性，并在速度、准确性和功耗方面取得了优于基于Python的对应物的成果。

Abstract: Since current neural network development systems in Xilinx and VLSI require
codevelopment with Python libraries, the first stage of a convolutional network
has been implemented by developing a convolutional layer entirely in Verilog.
This handcoded design, free of IP cores and based on a filter polynomial like
structure, enables straightforward deployment not only on low cost FPGAs but
also on SoMs, SoCs, and ASICs. We analyze the limitations of numerical
representations and compare our implemented architecture, smallNet, with its
computer based counterpart, demonstrating a 5.1x speedup, over 81%
classification accuracy, and a total power consumption of just 1.5 W. The
algorithm is validated on a single-core Cora Z7, demonstrating its feasibility
for real time, resource-constrained embedded applications.

</details>


### [453] [LLM-Powered Code Analysis and Optimization for Gaussian Splatting Kernels](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25626)
*Yi Hu,Huiyang Zhou*

Main category: cs.AR

TL;DR: 该论文首次利用大型语言模型 (LLM) 来分析和优化 3D 高斯泼溅 (3DGS) GPU 内核，在 MipNeRF360 数据集上实现了显著的速度提升，其中 GPT-5 提升了 24%。通过结合性能分析器信息，LLM 优化可以将性能提升高达 42%。虽然手动优化仍有优势（最高 48%），但 LLM 仍能在 Seele 等新框架上发现未被专家注意到的优化机会（提升 6%），展示了人机协作的潜力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 手动优化 3DGS 性能耗时耗力且易出错，需要专业知识。本文旨在探索利用大型语言模型 (LLM) 自动分析和优化 3DGS GPU 内核，以克服这些挑战。

Method: 利用 LLM 分析和优化 3DGS GPU 内核。首先，直接使用 LLM 优化原始 3DGS 代码。然后，将性能分析器的信息馈送给 LLM，以进一步增强优化效果。最后，在新的 3DGS 框架 Seele 上测试 LLM 的优化能力。

Result: LLM 在原始 3DGS 代码上实现了显著的速度提升，Deepseek 提升 19%，GPT-5 提升 24%。结合性能分析器信息后，性能提升高达 42%（GPT-5）和 38%（Deepseek）。与手动优化（最高 48%）相比，LLM 仍有提升空间。在 Seele 框架上，LLM 仍能提升 6% 的性能，证明了其在发现专家遗漏的优化机会方面的能力。

Conclusion: LLM 在优化 3DGS GPU 内核方面展现出巨大潜力，可以实现显著的速度提升，甚至在专业优化过的框架上也能发现新的优化点。尽管手动优化目前仍略胜一筹，但 LLM 的分析和优化能力，特别是与人类专家协作时，预示着未来 GPU 内核优化的一种新途径。

Abstract: 3D Gaussian splatting (3DGS) is a transformative technique with profound
implications on novel view synthesis and real-time rendering. Given its
importance, there have been many attempts to improve its performance. However,
with the increasing complexity of GPU architectures and the vast search space
of performance-tuning parameters, it is a challenging task. Although manual
optimizations have achieved remarkable speedups, they require domain expertise
and the optimization process can be highly time consuming and error prone. In
this paper, we propose to exploit large language models (LLMs) to analyze and
optimize Gaussian splatting kernels. To our knowledge, this is the first work
to use LLMs to optimize highly specialized real-world GPU kernels. We reveal
the intricacies of using LLMs for code optimization and analyze the code
optimization techniques from the LLMs. We also propose ways to collaborate with
LLMs to further leverage their capabilities. For the original 3DGS code on the
MipNeRF360 datasets, LLMs achieve significant speedups, 19% with Deepseek and
24% with GPT-5, demonstrating the different capabilities of different LLMs. By
feeding additional information from performance profilers, the performance
improvement from LLM-optimized code is enhanced to up to 42% and 38% on
average. In comparison, our best-effort manually optimized version can achieve
a performance improvement up to 48% and 39% on average, showing that there are
still optimizations beyond the capabilities of current LLMs. On the other hand,
even upon a newly proposed 3DGS framework with algorithmic optimizations,
Seele, LLMs can still further enhance its performance by 6%, showing that there
are optimization opportunities missed by domain experts. This highlights the
potential of collaboration between domain experts and LLMs.

</details>


### [454] [SAIL: SRAM-Accelerated LLM Inference System with Lookup-Table-based GEMV](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25853)
*Jingyao Zhang,Jaewoo Park,Jongeun Lee,Elaheh Sadredini*

Main category: cs.AR

TL;DR: SAIL通过SRAM加速LLM在CPU上的推理，支持任意比特精度，并解决了CPU在低精度计算和内存瓶颈方面的挑战，实现了显著的性能提升和成本效益。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: CPU推理对于普及AI至关重要，但现有CPU架构难以高效处理量化模型所需的低精度计算（不同模型和层需要不同比特精度），并且在Token生成阶段存在内存瓶颈。

Method: SAIL提出了一种基于CPU的推理解决方案，集成了三项关键创新：1. 引入了基于SRAM的片上内存（PIM）的批处理查找表（LUT）通用矩阵向量乘法（LUT-GEMV），通过查找表实现高数据重用并减少内存移动。2. 提出了模式感知LUT优化，识别并利用输入激活模式中的冗余，减少了13.8%的计算周期。3. 开发了一种利用PIM并行性的内存内类型转换算法，高效地执行量化/反量化操作，减轻了CPU向量单元的压力。

Result: SAIL架构的硬件开销仅为2%，并且只需要一条新指令，同时保留了计算和存储的双重功能。实验评估表明，与ARM Neoverse-N1 CPU基线相比，SAIL实现了高达10.7倍的加速和19.9倍的更高每美元吞吐量，与NVIDIA V100 GPU相比，成本效益提高了7.04倍。

Conclusion: SAIL为高效的CPU推理提供了切实可行的方案，解决了LLM在CPU上推理面临的低精度计算和内存瓶颈挑战，并实现了显著的性能提升和成本效益。

Abstract: Large Language Model (LLM) inference requires substantial computational
resources, yet CPU-based inference remains essential for democratizing AI due
to the widespread availability of CPUs compared to specialized accelerators.
However, efficient LLM inference on CPUs faces two fundamental challenges: (1)
existing CPU architectures struggle with low-precision arithmetic required by
quantized models, where optimal bit precision varies across models and layers;
and (2) the memory-bound nature of the token generation phase creates severe
performance bottlenecks. To address these challenges, we propose SAIL
(SRAM-Accelerated Inference of LLMs), a CPU-based inference solution that
efficiently supports arbitrary bit precisions with minimal overhead. SAIL
integrates three key innovations: First, we introduce Batched LUT-based General
Matrix-Vector Multiplication (LUT-GEMV) with SRAM-based processing-in-memory,
enabling high data reuse through lookup tables and reducing memory movement.
Second, our Pattern-Aware LUT optimization identifies and exploits redundancy
in input activation patterns, reducing computation cycles by 13.8\%. Third, we
develop an in-memory type conversion algorithm that leverages PIM's parallelism
for efficient de-/quantization operations, alleviating pressure on CPU's vector
units. Our architecture requires only 2\% hardware overhead and a single new
instruction, while maintaining dual functionality as both compute and storage
units. Experimental evaluations using a modified gem5 simulator demonstrate
that SAIL achieves up to 10.7x speedup and 19.9x higher tokens per dollar
compared to ARM Neoverse-N1 CPU baselines, and up to 7.04x better cost
efficiency than NVIDIA V100 GPUs, establishing a practical path for efficient
CPU-based LLM inference.

</details>


### [455] [Runtime Energy Monitoring for RISC-V Soft-Cores](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26065)
*Alberto Scionti,Paolo Savio,Francesco Lubrano,Olivier Terzo,Marco Ferretti,Florin Apopei,Juri Bellucci,Ennio Spano,Luca Carriere*

Main category: cs.AR

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种无需复杂微架构模型即可在运行时监控计算系统能耗的整体方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在设计先进的计算基础设施时，能源效率是一个主要问题。为了克服在设计空间探索中需要持续调整模型以匹配评估系统以提取有意义信息和确定系统能耗的限制，提出了一种新的方法。

Method: 该方法基于一个测量板和一个基于FPGA的片上系统。测量板捕获驱动FPGA的电流和电压，并通过特定的内存区域暴露这些值。运行的服务读取并计算能耗统计数据，而无需消耗FPGA设备上的额外资源。该方法还可扩展到监控多节点基础设施。

Result: 该方法能够避免运行复杂的微架构模型，从而在运行时监控能耗。它可以扩展到多节点集群，并可用于优化RISC-V软核上的浅层人工神经网络的性能和能耗。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于测量板和FPGA的方法为运行时能耗监控提供了一种无需复杂模型的方法，并且易于扩展到更大的系统。该框架旨在用于航空设计应用，以优化神经网络的性能和能耗。

Abstract: Energy efficiency is one of the major concern in designing advanced computing
infrastructures. From single nodes to large-scale systems (data centers),
monitoring the energy consumption of the computing system when applications run
is a critical task. Designers and application developers often rely on software
tools and detailed architectural models to extract meaningful information and
determine the system energy consumption. However, when a design space
exploration is required, designers may incur in continuous tuning of the models
to match with the system under evaluation. To overcome such limitations, we
propose a holistic approach to monitor energy consumption at runtime without
the need of running complex (micro-)architectural models. Our approach is based
on a measurement board coupled with a FPGA-based System-on-Module. The
measuring board captures currents and voltages (up to tens measuring points)
driving the FPGA and exposes such values through a specific memory region. A
running service reads and computes energy consumption statistics without
consuming extra resources on the FPGA device. Our approach is also scalable to
monitoring of multi-nodes infrastructures (clusters). We aim to leverage this
framework to perform experiments in the context of an aeronautical design
application; specifically, we will look at optimizing performance and energy
consumption of a shallow artificial neural network on RISC-V based soft-cores.

</details>


<div id='cs.LO'></div>

# cs.LO [[Back]](#toc)

### [456] [Monoid Structures on Indexed Containers](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25879)
*Michele De Pascalis,Tarmo Uustalu,Niccolò Veltrì*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: Indexed containers form a monoidal category, whose monoids correspond to monads on Set^I, with examples like state, writer, and free monads.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: To generalize containers for dependently typed programming and study their monoidal structure and relation to monads.

Method: Defined a monoidal structure on the category of I-indexed containers and characterized its monoids, showing their correspondence to monads on Set^I.

Result: A combinatorial characterization of monoids in the monoidal category of I-indexed containers, which precisely correspond to monads on Set^I. Examples of such monads are provided.

Conclusion: Monoids in the monoidal category of I-indexed containers are equivalent to monads on Set^I, with several examples illustrated. The work is formalized in Cubical Agda.

Abstract: Containers represent a wide class of type constructions relevant for
functional programming and (co)inductive reasoning. Indexed containers
generalize this notion to better fit the scope of dependently typed
programming. When interpreting types to be sets, a container describes an
endofunctor on the category of sets while an I-indexed container describes an
endofunctor on the category Set^I of I-indexed families of sets.
  We consider the monoidal structure on the category of I-indexed containers
whose tensor product of containers describes the composition of the respective
induced endofunctors. We then give a combinatorial characterization of monoids
in this monoidal category, and we show how these monoids correspond precisely
to monads on the induced endofunctors on Set^I. Lastly, we conclude by
presenting some examples of monads on Set^I that fall under our
characterization, including the product of two monads, indexed variants of the
state and the writer monads and an example of a free monad. The technical
results of this work are accompanied by a formalization in the proof assistant
Cubical Agda.

</details>


### [457] [A Function-Set Framework: General Properties and Applications to Modal Logic](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25880)
*Luke Bayzid,Alexandre Madeira,Manuel A. Martins*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: 本文提出了一个基于集合论概念的通用结构，可以容纳逻辑和语义框架，并展示了其在模态逻辑表示中的通用性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 由于表示法选项众多，且不同框架用于不同场景，因此在不同表示法之间比较结果可能很困难。本文旨在提出一种通用的方法来解决这个问题。

Method: 提出一个基于集合论概念的通用结构，并用其来表示模态逻辑。

Result: 该通用结构可以容纳许多与逻辑和语义框架相关的情况，并且所有模态逻辑都可以表示在该框架内。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于集合论概念的通用结构具有高度的通用性，可以有效地表示各种模态逻辑。

Abstract: Representations are essential to mathematically model phenomena, but there
are many options available. While each of those options provides useful
properties with which to solve problems related to the phenomena in study,
comparing results between these representations can be non-trivial, as
different frameworks are used for different contexts. We present a general
structure based on set-theoretic concepts that accommodates many situations
related to logical and semantic frameworks. We show the versatility of this
approach by presenting alternative constructions of modal logic; in particular,
all modal logics can be represented within the framework.

</details>


### [458] [Characterization of Lattice Properties Within Modal Extensions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25882)
*Alfredo R. Freire,Manuel A. Martins*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: 本篇论文探讨了基于格的逻辑在模态语言中的扩展，发现模态逻辑的解释存在多种可能性，特别是必然性算子的解释并不唯一。研究了“必然性”解释为所有可达世界中公式真值的交集（“正常解释”）的逻辑性质，以及其他解释方式，重点关注了逻辑系统是否满足公理K和其他常见的模态有效性。此外，还考虑了仅对在所有可达世界中都成立的公式归因必然性的情况。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究基于格的逻辑在模态语言中的扩展，并探索必然性算子的多种解释方式及其逻辑性质。

Method: 1. 提出“正常解释”，即将必然性定义为公式在所有可达世界真值的交集。 2. 考察该解释及其他解释下的逻辑性质。 3. 分析逻辑系统满足公理K及其他常见模态有效性的条件。 4. 探讨仅对在所有可达世界都成立的公式归因必然性的情况。

Result: 确定了基于格的模态逻辑的多种解释方式，并分析了在不同解释下逻辑系统满足公理K及其他常见模态有效性的条件。

Conclusion: 基于格的逻辑扩展到模态语言是可行的，并且存在多种解释必然性算子的方法，这些方法导致了不同的逻辑性质。其中，“正常解释”（必然性为可达世界真值交集）是一种自然且值得研究的解释方式。

Abstract: This paper investigates the extension of lattice-based logics into modal
languages. We observe that such extensions admit multiple approaches, as the
interpretation of the necessity operator is not uniquely determined by the
underlying lattice structure. The most natural interpretation defines necessity
as the meet of the truth values of a formula across all accessible worlds -- an
approach we refer to as the \textitnormal interpretation. We examine the
logical properties that emerge under this and other interpretations, including
the conditions under which the resulting modal logic satisfies the axiom K and
other common modal validities. Furthermore, we consider cases in which
necessity is attributed exclusively to formulas that hold in all accessible
worlds.

</details>


### [459] [Nominal Sets in Rocq](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25883)
*Fabrício Sanches Paranhos,Daniel Ventura*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: 该论文在 Rocq 中形式化了名义集合及其相关概念，利用类型类和广义重写机制简化了定义和证明。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 形式化具有绑定结构的语法，使其更接近非正式的表述，并利用名义集合捕捉名称（不）相关性的概念。

Method: 在 Rocq 中，通过类型类层次结构和广义重写机制，形式化了名义集合、新鲜性、名义 alpha-等价性、名称抽象和有限支持函数。
