Result: 实现了名义集合的形式化，并展示了类型类和重写机制在简化定义和证明方面的有效性，同时缓解了“setoid hell”问题。

Conclusion: 讨论了如何获得构造性的 alpha-结构递归和归纳组合子，以构建一个名义框架。

Abstract: Nominal techniques have been praised for their ability to formalize grammars
with binding structures closer to their informal developments. At its core,
there lies the definition of nominal sets, which capture the notion of name
(in)dependence through a simple, and uniform, metatheory based on name
permutations. We present a formal constructive development of nominal sets in
Rocq (formerly known as Coq), with its main design and project decisions.
Furthermore, we formalize the concepts of freshness, nominal alpha-equivalence,
name abstraction, and finitely supported functions. Our implementation relies
on a type class hierarchy which, combined with Rocq generalized rewriting
mechanism, achieves concise definitions and proofs, whilst easing the
well-known "setoid hell" scenario. We conclude with a discussion on how to
obtain the constructive alpha-structural recursion and induction combinators,
towards a nominal framework.

</details>


### [460] [Demystifying Codensity Monads via Duality](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26197)
*Fabian Lenke,Nico Wittrock,Stefan Milius,Henning Urbat*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: Codensity monads are a universal way to create complex monads from simple functors. This paper offers a unified categorical approach to codensity monad presentations, simplifying proofs and discovering new ones.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Many important monads in logic, semantics, and probabilistic computation have been presented as codensity monads, but these proofs are often complex. The authors aim to simplify these proofs and find new codensity presentations.

Method: The paper proposes a unifying categorical approach based on relating the presenting functor to a dense functor via a duality between categories. This framework is used to prove a general presentation result.

Result: The proposed framework simplifies the proofs of most known codensity presentations by reducing them to standard duality results. It also yields new codensity presentations for filter monads (on sets and topological spaces), the lower Vietoris monad (on topological spaces), and the expectation monad (on sets).

Conclusion: The authors present a general and simple duality-based framework for codensity monad presentations, which unifies existing results and generates novel ones with significantly reduced proof complexity.

Abstract: Codensity monads provide a universal method to generate complex monads from
simple functors. Recently, a wide range of important monads in logic,
denotational semantics, and probabilistic computation, such as several
incarnations of the ultrafilter monad, the Vietoris monad, and the Giry monad,
have been presented as codensity monads, using complex arguments. We propose a
unifying categorical approach to codensity presentations of monads, based on
the idea of relating the presenting functor to a dense functor via a suitable
duality between categories. We prove a general presentation result applying to
every such situation and demonstrate that most codensity presentations known in
the literature emerge from this strikingly simple duality-based setup,
drastically alleviating the complexity of their proofs and in many cases
completely reducing them to standard duality results. Additionally, we derive a
number of novel codensity presentations using our framework, including the
first non-trivial codensity presentations for the filter monads on sets and
topological spaces, the lower Vietoris monad on topological spaces, and the
expectation monad on sets.

</details>


### [461] [Logical Approaches to Non-deterministic Polynomial Time over Semirings](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26214)
*Timon Barlag,Nicolas Fröhlich,Teemu Hankala,Miika Hannula,Minna Hirvonen,Vivian Holzapfel,Juha Kontinen,Arne Meier,Laura Strieker*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: BSS机在半环上的非确定性多项式时间问题可以通过存在第二阶逻辑来表征，并且该问题的可满足性问题是该版本NP的典型完全问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 通过存在第二阶逻辑来表征BSS机在半环上的非确定性多项式时间问题，并研究其可满足性问题和布尔部分。

Method: 使用存在第二阶逻辑来表征BSS机在半环上的非确定性多项式时间问题，并利用半环语义来研究其可满足性问题。

Result: BSS机在半环上的非确定性多项式时间问题可以通过存在第二阶逻辑来表征。该问题的可满足性问题是该版本NP的典型完全问题。存在第一阶理论是该版本NP的布尔部分的完全问题。

Conclusion: BSS机在半环上的非确定性多项式时间问题与存在第二阶逻辑密切相关，并且其可满足性问题和存在第一阶理论具有完全性特征。

Abstract: We provide a logical characterization of non-deterministic polynomial time
defined by BSS machines over semirings via existential second-order logic
interpreted in the semiring semantics developed by Gr\"adel and Tannen.
Furthermore, we show that, similarly to the classical setting, the
satisfiability problem of propositional logic in the semiring semantics is the
canonical complete problem for this version of NP. Eventually, we prove that
the true existential first-order theory of the semiring is a complete problem
for the so-called Boolean part of this version of NP.

</details>


### [462] [Transporting Theorems about Typeability in LF Across Schematically Defined Contexts](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26362)
*Chase Johnson,Gopalan Nadathur*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: LF 依赖类型 lambda 演算用于形式化面向对象的系统，证明这些系统的属性需要处理 LF 类型的判断。当使用高阶抽象语法表示绑定结构时，类型判断包含分配类型给绑定变量的上下文，公式需要允许对上下文进行量化。在实际推理中，经常需要在满足一个模式描述的上下文上的通用量化定理与满足另一个模式描述的上下文之间进行转换。本文利用 LF 规范的 $\mathcal{L}_{LF}$ 逻辑，提供了一个逻辑基础来支持这种转换。我们开发了一个转换证明规则，并证明了它相对于 $\mathcal{L}_{LF}$ 的语义是可靠的。该规则的关键在于一种上下文模式包含关系，它使用类型之间的从属关系来确定相对于单个 LF 类型判断的上下文等价性。最后，我们讨论了将该规则集成到 Adelfa 证明助手中的情况以及在实际推理示例中的应用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 证明关于使用 LF 编码的面向对象系统的属性需要处理包含上下文的 LF 类型判断，并且在实际推理中需要将涉及上下文的通用量化定理在不同的模式描述之间进行转换。

Method: 利用 LF 规范的 $\mathcal{L}_{LF}$ 逻辑，开发了一个转换证明规则，并使用类型之间的从属关系来确定上下文的等价性，以证明该规则的可靠性。

Result: 提出了一种新的上下文模式包含关系，该关系使用类型之间的从属关系来确定上下文的等价性。开发了一个转换证明规则，并证明了其在 $\mathcal{L}_{LF}$ 逻辑下的可靠性。

Conclusion: 提出的转换证明规则及其上下文模式包含关系为在 Adelfa 证明助手等工具中进行涉及 LF 类型判断的推理提供了逻辑基础，并已在实际推理示例中得到验证。

Abstract: The dependently-typed lambda calculus LF is often used as a vehicle for
formalizing rule-based descriptions of object systems. Proving properties of
object systems encoded in this fashion requires reasoning about formulas over
LF typing judgements. An important characteristic of LF is that it supports a
higher-order abstract syntax representation of binding structure. When such an
encoding is used, the typing judgements include contexts that assign types to
bound variables and formulas must therefore allow for quantification over
contexts. The possible instantiations of such quantifiers are usually governed
by schematic descriptions that must also be made explicit for effectiveness in
reasoning. In practical reasoning tasks, it is often necessary to transport
theorems involving universal quantification over contexts satisfying one
schematic description to those satisfying another description. We provide here
a logical justification for this ability. Towards this end, we utilize the
logic $\mathcal{L}_{LF}$, which has previously been designed for formalizing
properties of LF specifications. We develop a transportation proof rule and
show it to be sound relative to the semantics of $\mathcal{L}_{LF}$. Key to
this proof rule is a notion of context schema subsumption that uses the
subordination relation between types as a means for determining the equivalence
of contexts relative to individual LF typing judgements. We discuss the
incorporation of this rule into the Adelfa proof assistant and its use in
actual reasoning examples.

</details>

# cs.SI [[Back]](#toc)

### [463] [MHINDR -- a DSM5 based mental health diagnosis and recommendation framework using LLM](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25992)
*Vaishali Agarwal,Sachin Thukral,Arnab Chatterjee*

Main category: cs.SI

TL;DR: MHINDR是一个基于大语言模型的框架，结合DSM-5标准，用于分析用户生成的文本，诊断心理健康状况，并为心理健康从业者提供个性化的干预措施和见解。该框架提取时间信息和心理特征，以全面总结用户的心理健康状况，并提供可扩展、可定制、数据驱动的治疗建议。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 心理健康论坛提供了关于心理问题、压力源和潜在解决方案的宝贵见解，因此需要一个能够分析这些信息并提供专业指导的框架。

Method: 该框架利用大语言模型（LLM）并整合DSM-5标准，提取时间信息和心理特征，以准确诊断、跟踪症状进展，并生成个性化的干预措施和见解。

Result: 该框架能够提供可扩展、可定制、数据驱动的治疗建议，适用于各种临床环境、患者需求和职场健康计划。

Conclusion: MHINDR框架为心理健康从业者提供了一个强大的工具，能够利用用户生成的内容来辅助诊断和治疗，并提供个性化的干预措施。

Abstract: Mental health forums offer valuable insights into psychological issues,
stressors, and potential solutions. We propose MHINDR, a large language model
(LLM) based framework integrated with DSM-5 criteria to analyze user-generated
text, dignose mental health conditions, and generate personalized interventions
and insights for mental health practitioners. Our approach emphasizes on the
extraction of temporal information for accurate diagnosis and symptom
progression tracking, together with psychological features to create
comprehensive mental health summaries of users. The framework delivers
scalable, customizable, and data-driven therapeutic recommendations, adaptable
to diverse clinical contexts, patient needs, and workplace well-being programs.

</details>


### [464] [Basic Cycle Ratio: Cost-Effective Ranking of Influential Spreaders from Local and Global Perspectives](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26220)
*Wenxin Zheng,Wenfeng Shi,Tianlong Fan,Linyuan Lv*

Main category: cs.SI

TL;DR: BCR是一种用于识别网络中具有双重局部和全局作用的传播节点的新方法，该方法通过利用基本周期和周期比来评估节点的重要性，并在各种真实社交网络上进行了评估，结果显示BCR优于传统方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 识别网络中具有双重局部和全局作用的有影响力的传播者是一个关键但具有挑战性的任务。

Method: 提出了一种名为基本周期比（BCR）的新颖方法来评估节点重要性，该方法利用基本周期和周期比来捕捉节点局部邻域内的重要性以及其在维持网络内聚性方面的全局作用。

Result: 在六个不同的真实社交网络上评估了BCR，结果表明BCR在选择强大的传播者和增强信息传播方面比传统的中心度和基于周期的其他方法更有效。

Conclusion: BCR为社交网络应用提供了一种经济高效且实用的解决方案，能够有效地识别有影响力的传播者。

Abstract: Spreading processes are fundamental to complex networks. Identifying
influential spreaders with dual local and global roles presents a crucial yet
challenging task. To address this, our study proposes a novel method, the Basic
Cycle Ratio (BCR), for assessing node importance. BCR leverages basic cycles
and the cycle ratio to uniquely capture a node's local significance within its
immediate neighborhood and its global role in maintaining network cohesion. We
evaluated BCR on six diverse real-world social networks. Our method
outperformed traditional centrality measures and other cycle-based approaches,
proving more effective at selecting powerful spreaders and enhancing
information diffusion. Besides, BCR offers a cost-effective and practical
solution for social network applications.

</details>

### [465] [Computational Design and Single-Wire Sensing of 3D Printed Objects with Integrated Capacitive Touchpoints](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25387)
*S. Sandra Bae,Takanori Fujiwara,Danielle Albers Szafir,Ellen Yi-Luen Do,Michael L. Rivera*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种计算设计流程，可将多个电容式触摸点嵌入具有闭合网格且无自相交的3D模型中，并自动生成连接触摸区域的导电路径，优化电阻-电容延迟以实现单线或双线感应，最终实现了93.35%的平均单线精度，并展示了六个应用实例。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了解决目前生产交互式3D打印对象需要耗时的3D设计和售后电子器件安装的问题。

Method: 提出了一种计算设计流程，能够将多个电容式触摸点嵌入任何具有闭合网格且无自相交的3D模型中。用户在3D对象的表面定义交互区域，该流程会自动生成导电路径来连接这些触摸区域，并优化电阻-电容延迟，使得所有区域都能通过单线或双线连接进行感应。

Result: 通过计算和传感性能评估（单线平均精度达到93.35%）以及六个应用示例，证明了该方法的有效性。

Conclusion: 该传感技术不仅支持现有的应用（如原型制作），而且有望通过3D打印技术完全制造交互式设备。

Abstract: Producing interactive 3D printed objects currently requires laborious 3D
design and post-instrumentation with off-the-shelf electronics. Multi-material
3D printing using conductive PLA presents opportunities to mitigate these
challenges. We present a computational design pipeline that embeds multiple
capacitive touchpoints into any 3D model that has a closed mesh without
self-intersection. With our pipeline, users define touchpoints on the 3D
object's surface to indicate interactive regions. Our pipeline then
automatically generates a conductive path to connect the touch regions. This
path is optimized to output unique resistor-capacitor delays when each region
is touched, resulting in all regions being able to be sensed through a
double-wire or single-wire connection. We illustrate our approach's utility
with five computational and sensing performance evaluations (achieving 93.35%
mean accuracy for single-wire) and six application examples. Our sensing
technique supports existing uses (e.g., prototyping) and highlights the growing
promise to produce interactive devices entirely with 3D printing.
  Project website: https://github.com/d-rep-lab/3dp-singlewire-sensing

</details>


### [466] [Interpolated Adaptive Linear Reduced Order Modeling for Deformation Dynamics](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25392)
*Yutian Tao,Maurizio Chiaramonte,Pablo Fernandez*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 提出一种自适应线性降阶模型（ROM）策略，通过动态调整降阶映射来提高大变形模拟的准确性，并结合历史位移基和Grassmann插值以增强鲁棒性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统的线性降阶模型（ROM）在模拟变形动力学时，由于固定的线性化降阶映射，其准确性受到限制，尤其是在处理大变形时。

Method: 提出一种新的自适应策略，允许降阶映射动态响应变形状态的变化。引入历史位移基和Grassmann插值来处理大变形问题。

Result: 与基于主成分分析（PCA）的线性ROM模拟相比，该方法在保持计算成本相当的情况下，显著提高了准确性，并通过在线误差分析和定性比较进行了验证。

Conclusion: 所提出的自适应线性ROM方法在大变形场景下能显著提高模拟精度，同时保持了计算效率。

Abstract: Linear reduced-order modeling (ROM) is widely used for efficient simulation
of deformation dynamics, but its accuracy is often limited by the fixed
linearization of the reduced mapping. We propose a new adaptive strategy for
linear ROM that allows the reduced mapping to vary dynamically in response to
the evolving deformation state, significantly improving accuracy over
traditional linear approaches. To further handle large deformations, we
introduce a historical displacement basis combined with Grassmann
interpolation, enabling the system to recover robustly even in challenging
scenarios. We evaluate our method through quantitative online-error analysis
and qualitative comparisons with principal component analysis (PCA)-based
linear ROM simulations, demonstrating substantial accuracy gains while
preserving comparable computational costs.

</details>


### [467] [MoReFlow: Motion Retargeting Learning through Unsupervised Flow Matching](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25600)
*Wontaek Kim,Tianyu Li,Sehoon Ha*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: MoReFlow是一个无监督运动迁移框架，通过流匹配学习不同角色间的运动嵌入空间对应关系，实现灵活、可逆的运动迁移，在多样化角色和任务中表现优于基线方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有运动迁移方法受限于手工约束或配对数据集，难以应用于不同形态的角色或机器人，并且忽视了特定领域的目标（如动画风格迁移或机器人任务空间对齐）。

Method: MoReFlow框架分为两个阶段：1. 使用VQ-VAE训练每个角色的运动嵌入，生成紧凑的潜在表示。2. 利用条件耦合的流匹配来对齐不同角色间的潜在空间，同时学习条件和无条件匹配，以实现鲁棒且灵活的迁移。

Result: MoReFlow能够实现高质量的运动迁移，适用于多样化的角色和任务，并且在可控性、泛化性和运动真实性方面优于现有方法。该框架无需配对数据即可进行灵活、可逆的运动迁移。

Conclusion: MoReFlow提供了一种新颖的无监督运动迁移方法，通过流匹配有效解决了现有方法的局限性，并在多个方面取得了显著的改进。

Abstract: Motion retargeting holds a premise of offering a larger set of motion data
for characters and robots with different morphologies. Many prior works have
approached this problem via either handcrafted constraints or paired motion
datasets, limiting their applicability to humanoid characters or narrow
behaviors such as locomotion. Moreover, they often assume a fixed notion of
retargeting, overlooking domain-specific objectives like style preservation in
animation or task-space alignment in robotics. In this work, we propose
MoReFlow, Motion Retargeting via Flow Matching, an unsupervised framework that
learns correspondences between characters' motion embedding spaces. Our method
consists of two stages. First, we train tokenized motion embeddings for each
character using a VQ-VAE, yielding compact latent representations. Then, we
employ flow matching with conditional coupling to align the latent spaces
across characters, which simultaneously learns conditioned and unconditioned
matching to achieve robust but flexible retargeting. Once trained, MoReFlow
enables flexible and reversible retargeting without requiring paired data.
Experiments demonstrate that MoReFlow produces high-quality motions across
diverse characters and tasks, offering improved controllability,
generalization, and motion realism compared to the baselines.

</details>


### [468] [Vector sketch animation generation with differentialable motion trajectories](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25857)
*Xinding Zhu,Xinye Yang,Shuyang Zheng,Zhexin Zhang,Fei Gao,Jing Huang,Jiazhou Chen*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种新的端到端自动生成矢量草图动画的方法，以解决视频草图动画生成中的时间连贯性问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 视频草图动画生成面临时间连贯性挑战，现有方法难以解决闪烁问题。

Method: 提出了一种可微分运动轨迹（DMT）表示方法，使用可微分的多项式轨迹来描述笔画控制点的帧间运动，并通过稀疏跟踪点进行显式空间建模。

Result: 该方法显著提高了语义一致性和时间连贯性，实现了高帧率输出，并且在DAVIS和LVOS数据集上优于现有方法，在3D模型和文本到视频数据上进行了跨域验证，证明了其鲁棒性和兼容性。

Conclusion: 所提出的DMT表示方法能够有效解决闪烁问题，提高生成草图动画的质量和效率，并具有良好的通用性。

Abstract: Sketching is a direct and inexpensive means of visual expression. Though
image-based sketching has been well studied, video-based sketch animation
generation is still very challenging due to the temporal coherence requirement.
In this paper, we propose a novel end-to-end automatic generation approach for
vector sketch animation. To solve the flickering issue, we introduce a
Differentiable Motion Trajectory (DMT) representation that describes the
frame-wise movement of stroke control points using differentiable
polynomial-based trajectories. DMT enables global semantic gradient propagation
across multiple frames, significantly improving the semantic consistency and
temporal coherence, and producing high-framerate output. DMT employs a
Bernstein basis to balance the sensitivity of polynomial parameters, thus
achieving more stable optimization. Instead of implicit fields, we introduce
sparse track points for explicit spatial modeling, which improves efficiency
and supports long-duration video processing. Evaluations on DAVIS and LVOS
datasets demonstrate the superiority of our approach over SOTA methods.
Cross-domain validation on 3D models and text-to-video data confirms the
robustness and compatibility of our approach.

</details>


### [469] [GaussEdit: Adaptive 3D Scene Editing with Text and Image Prompts](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26055)
*Zhenyu Shu,Junlong Yu,Kai Chao,Shiqing Xin,Ligang Liu*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: GaussEdit是一个利用3D高斯泼溅进行文本和图像引导的3D场景编辑框架，通过三阶段流程实现高质量、高保真度的场景编辑。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本研究旨在开发一个能够根据文本和图像提示进行自适应3D场景编辑的框架，以解决现有方法在编辑精度、视觉保真度和处理速度方面的不足。

Method: GaussEdit采用3D高斯泼溅作为场景表示，通过三阶段过程进行编辑：1. 初始化3D高斯以确保高质量编辑。2. 采用自适应全局-局部优化策略和类别引导正则化技术来平衡全局场景一致性和局部细节编辑，并解决Janus问题。3. 利用图像到图像合成技术增强编辑对象的纹理，确保结果的视觉真实性。

Result: 实验结果表明，GaussEdit在编辑精度、视觉保真度和处理速度方面优于现有方法，能够成功地将用户指定的概念嵌入3D场景。

Conclusion: GaussEdit是一个强大的3D场景编辑工具，通过其独特的三阶段编辑流程，为用户提供了详细且可驱动的3D场景编辑能力，相比传统方法有显著的改进。

Abstract: This paper presents GaussEdit, a framework for adaptive 3D scene editing
guided by text and image prompts. GaussEdit leverages 3D Gaussian Splatting as
its backbone for scene representation, enabling convenient Region of Interest
selection and efficient editing through a three-stage process. The first stage
involves initializing the 3D Gaussians to ensure high-quality edits. The second
stage employs an Adaptive Global-Local Optimization strategy to balance global
scene coherence and detailed local edits and a category-guided regularization
technique to alleviate the Janus problem. The final stage enhances the texture
of the edited objects using a sophisticated image-to-image synthesis technique,
ensuring that the results are visually realistic and align closely with the
given prompts. Our experimental results demonstrate that GaussEdit surpasses
existing methods in editing accuracy, visual fidelity, and processing speed. By
successfully embedding user-specified concepts into 3D scenes, GaussEdit is a
powerful tool for detailed and user-driven 3D scene editing, offering
significant improvements over traditional methods.

</details>


### [470] [Palace: A Library for Interactive GPU-Accelerated Large Tensor Processing and Visualization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26213)
*Dominik Drees,Benjamin Risse*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: Palace是一个开源库，用于交互式和加速的out-of-core张量处理和可视化，可在工作站硬件上运行，并能与现有系统相媲美。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 随着科学成像和模拟技术的发展，张量数据集的规模不断增大，因此对out-of-core处理和可视化技术的需求日益增长。

Method: Palace采用高性能异步并发架构和简单的计算图接口，实现了交互式的out-of-core处理流水线。

Result: 在基准测试中，Palace在体积渲染和分层随机游走分割方面表现优于或等于现有技术。该库还适用于从2D图像到4D时间序列的各种张量数据集。

Conclusion: Palace是一个通用的out-of-core张量处理和可视化库，性能优越，易于使用，适用于各种科学领域。

Abstract: Tensor datasets (two-, three-, or higher-dimensional) are fundamental to many
scientific fields utilizing imaging or simulation technologies. Advances in
these methods have led to ever-increasing data sizes and, consequently,
interest and development of out-of-core processing and visualization
techniques, although mostly as specialized solutions. Here we present Palace,
an open-source, cross-platform, general-purpose library for interactive and
accelerated out-of-core tensor processing and visualization. Through a
high-performance asynchronous concurrent architecture and a simple
compute-graph interface, Palace enables the interactive development of
out-of-core pipelines on workstation hardware. We demonstrate on benchmarks
that Palace outperforms or matches state-of-the-art systems for volume
rendering and hierarchical random-walker segmentation and demonstrate
applicability in use cases involving tensors from 2D images up to 4D time
series datasets.

</details>


### [471] [3DiFACE: Synthesizing and Editing Holistic 3D Facial Animation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26233)
*Balamurugan Thambiraja,Malte Prinzler,Sadegh Aliakbarian,Darren Cosker,Justus Thies*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 3DiFACE是一个新的语音驱动的3D面部动画方法，可以生成和编辑多样化、逼真的面部动画，并支持关键帧编辑和插值，解决了现有方法在精确控制、编辑和多样性方面的不足。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有语音驱动的3D面部动画方法在生成精确控制、逼真头部运动以及编辑动画方面存在挑战，并且忽略了同一语音输入可能对应多种唇部和头部运动的可能性。

Method: 提出了一种名为3DiFACE的新方法，该方法使用全卷积扩散模型，利用训练语料库中的音素级多样性，并通过引入说话风格个性化和新颖的稀疏引导运动扩散来实现精确控制和编辑。

Result: 通过定量和定性评估证明，3DiFACE能够为单一音频输入生成和编辑多样化的整体3D面部动画，并在高保真度和多样性之间进行控制。

Conclusion: 3DiFACE成功地解决了现有语音驱动3D面部动画在生成、控制和编辑方面的挑战，能够生成多样化且可编辑的动画，并在保真度和多样性之间提供良好的平衡。

Abstract: Creating personalized 3D animations with precise control and realistic head
motions remains challenging for current speech-driven 3D facial animation
methods. Editing these animations is especially complex and time consuming,
requires precise control and typically handled by highly skilled animators.
Most existing works focus on controlling style or emotion of the synthesized
animation and cannot edit/regenerate parts of an input animation. They also
overlook the fact that multiple plausible lip and head movements can match the
same audio input. To address these challenges, we present 3DiFACE, a novel
method for holistic speech-driven 3D facial animation. Our approach produces
diverse plausible lip and head motions for a single audio input and allows for
editing via keyframing and interpolation. Specifically, we propose a
fully-convolutional diffusion model that can leverage the viseme-level
diversity in our training corpus. Additionally, we employ a speaking-style
personalization and a novel sparsely-guided motion diffusion to enable precise
control and editing. Through quantitative and qualitative evaluations, we
demonstrate that our method is capable of generating and editing diverse
holistic 3D facial animations given a single audio input, with control between
high fidelity and diversity. Code and models are available here:
https://balamuruganthambiraja.github.io/3DiFACE

</details>

# cond-mat.mtrl-sci [[Back]](#toc)

### [472] [Mechanisms of Matter: Language Inferential Benchmark on Physicochemical Hypothesis in Materials Synthesis](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25281)
*Yingming Pu,Tao Lin,Hongyu Chen*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: LLMs在材料合成中生成科学假设的能力未经量化，主要因为缺乏探测物理化学逻辑推理的基准。为此，我们引入了MatterMech，一个用于评估LLM在八个纳米材料合成领域中生成假设的基准。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: LLMs在材料合成中生成科学假设的能力未经量化，缺乏探测物理化学逻辑推理的基准。

Method: 引入MatterMech基准，评估LLM在八个纳米材料合成领域的假设生成能力，并提出一种新颖的原则感知提示方法。

Result: LLMs擅长抽象逻辑但未能将其推理基于基本的物理化学原理。所提出的原则感知提示方法在假设准确性和计算效率方面都优于标准的链式思考方法。

Conclusion: MatterMech基准和相关代码在GitHub上公开提供，为推进LLM在材料科学中可靠的科学假设生成提供了方法框架。

Abstract: The capacity of Large Language Models (LLMs) to generate valid scientific
hypotheses for materials synthesis remains largely unquantified, hindered by
the absence of benchmarks probing physicochemical logics reasoning. To address
this, we introduce MatterMech, a benchmark for evaluating LLM-generated
hypotheses across eight nanomaterial synthesis domains. Our analysis reveals a
critical disconnect: LLMs are proficient in abstract logic yet fail to ground
their reasoning in fundamental physicochemical principles. We demonstrate that
our proposed principle-aware prompting methodology substantially outperforms
standard Chain-of-Thought, enhancing both hypothesis accuracy and computational
efficiency. This work provides a methodological framework to advance LLMs
toward reliable scientific hypothesis generation in materials science. The
MatterMech benchmark and associated code is publicly available at
\href{https://github.com/amair-lab/MatterMech}{GitHub}.

</details>


### [473] [High-efficiency Pt$_{75}$Au$_{25}$-based spintronic terahertz emitters](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25303)
*Wenlu Shi,Gene D. Nelson,Han-Hsuan Wu,Yiwei Ju,Xiaoqing Pan,Wilson Ho,Ilya N. Krivorotov*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: Pt75Au25合金在自旋电子太赫兹发射器中展现出比传统Pt更高的太赫兹输出功率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 开发比现有光电导天线和非线性光学晶体具有更宽光谱覆盖范围和更高输出功率的新型自旋电子太赫兹发射器。

Method: 研究了基于PtxAu100-x合金的新型自旋电子太赫兹发射器（STE），通过调整合金成分和层厚，并与传统的Pt基STE进行比较，评估了太赫兹输出功率。

Result: 发现Pt75Au25是最佳合金，在CoFeB/Pt75Au25双层STE中比优化的CoFeB/Pt参考STE提高了30%的太赫兹功率。在W/CoFeB/Pt75Au25三层STE中，观察到比优化的W/CoFeB/Pt三层STE高10%的太赫兹功率。然而，两种STE在退火后效率均有所降低。

Conclusion: Pt75Au25合金作为高性能STE的新平台，其巨大的自旋霍尔效应显著提高了器件效率，优于传统的Pt基器件。

Abstract: Spintronic terahertz emitters (STEs) generate broadband THz radiation via
ultrafast spin-charge conversion in magnetic multilayers, offering spectral
coverage beyond that of photoconductive antennas and nonlinear optical
crystals. Here, we demonstrate a new type of STE based on PtxAu100-x alloy that
achieves significantly higher THz output power than widely used Pt-based
devices. Alloy composition and layer thickness tuning yield Pt75Au25 as the
optimal alloy providing a 30 % increase in THz power in CoFeB/Pt75Au25 bilayer
STEs compared to the optimized CoFeB/Pt reference STE. In
W/CoFeB/Pt$_{75}$Au$_{25}$ trilayer STEs, we observe a 10 % higher THz power
than in the optimized W/CoFeB/Pt trilayer. The STE efficiency is reduced upon
annealing for both Pt$_{75}$Au$_{25}$- and Pt-based STEs due to formation of
interfacial alloys. Our results establish Pt$_{75}$Au$_{25}$ as a promising
platform for high-performance STEs, where its giant spin Hall effect
significantly enhances efficiency over conventional Pt-based devices.

</details>


### [474] [Design Principles for Topological Thermoelectrics](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25371)
*Brian Skinner,Poulomi Chakraborty,Joshua Scales,Joseph P. Heremans*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: Error


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Error

Method: Error

Result: Error

Conclusion: Error

Abstract: Conventional metals, insulators, and semimetals are constrained by
fundamental limitations in terms of their thermoelectric performance.
Topological materials offer certain features that allow them to circumvent
these constraints, and potentially to form the basis for thermoelectric devices
with unprecedented efficiency. In this article we review the thermoelectric
performance of topological materials, focusing specifically on nodal
semimetals, such as Weyl and nodal-line semimetals. We discuss how certain
unique ``topological'' features of these materials -- namely their
topologically protected band touching points, electron-hole degenerate lowest
Landau level, and Berry curvature -- allow them to exhibit thermoelectric
properties that go beyond what is possible in conventional materials,
particularly in the presence of an applied magnetic field. We focus our
discussion on the goal of achieving large figure of merit $zT$, and for each
material class we summarize optimal \emph{design principles} for selecting
materials that maximize thermoelectric efficiency.
  We then use these optimal design principles to design and implement a
high-throughput database search for topological semimetals that are promising
as thermoelectrics. In addition to highlighting a number of materials that are
already known to have large magnetothermoelectric effects, our search uncovers
twelve additional materials that are especially promising for near-future
experiments.

</details>


### [475] [Fingerprinting Organic Molecules for the Inverse Design of Two-Dimensional Hybrid Perovskites with Target Energetics](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25728)
*Yongxin Lyu,Yifan Zhou,Yu Zhang,Yang Yang,Bosen Zou,Qiang Weng,Tong Xie,Claudio Cazorla,Jianhua Hao,Jun Yin,Tom Wu*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: AI驱动的逆向设计工作流，利用可逆的分子指纹和高通量DFT计算，为二维杂化钙钛矿发现了新的有机间隔基候选物。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 二维杂化钙钛矿具有优异的光电性能，但目前的设计方法依赖于试错和专家直觉，导致大部分化学空间未被探索，难以获得具有期望性能的材料。本研究旨在解决这一问题，通过引入一种新的逆向设计方法来克服这些限制。

Method: 本研究提出了一种基于可逆分子指纹表示的逆向设计工作流，该工作流能够处理数百万种共轭二铵有机间隔基。通过结合高通量密度泛函理论（DFT）计算、可解释的机器学习以及合成可行性筛选，确定了具有确定性能的有机间隔基。

Result: 本研究成功识别出新的有机间隔基候选物，这些候选物能在二维杂化钙钛矿中有机和无机基序之间实现确定性的能级对齐。

Conclusion: 本研究结果表明，将可逆的、具有物理意义的分子表示集成到人工智能辅助设计中，能够有效地为具有特定性能的杂化材料进行目标导向的设计，从而大大简化设计过程。

Abstract: Artificial intelligence (AI)-assisted workflows have transformed materials
discovery, enabling rapid exploration of chemical spaces of functional
materials. Endowed with extraordinary optoelectronic properties,
two-dimensional (2D) hybrid perovskites represent an exciting frontier, but
current efforts to design 2D perovskites rely heavily on trial-and-error and
expert intuition approaches, leaving most of the chemical space unexplored and
compromising the design of hybrid materials with desired properties. Here, we
introduce an inverse design workflow for Dion-Jacobson perovskites that is
built on an invertible fingerprint representation for millions of conjugated
diammonium organic spacers. By incorporating high-throughput density functional
theory (DFT) calculations, interpretable machine learning, and synthesis
feasibility screening, we identified new organic spacer candidates with
deterministic energy level alignment between the organic and the inorganic
motifs in the 2D hybrid perovskites. These results highlight the power of
integrating invertible, physically meaningful molecular representations into
AI-assisted design, streamlining the property-targeted design of hybrid
materials.

</details>


### [476] [Kinetic Monte Carlo prediction of the morphology of pentaerythritol tetranitrate](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25490)
*Jacob Jeffries,Himanshu Singh,Romain Perriot,Christian Negre,Antonio Redondo,Enrique Martinez*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 开发基于图的动力学蒙特卡洛（KMC）模拟程序，用于预测晶体形貌。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在原子尺度上模拟固-液界面的蒸发和吸附动力学，以预测晶体形貌。

Method: 将超胞状态编码为二元占位向量，将超胞拓扑编码为最近邻图，并计算系统相互作用能。结合简单的吸附扩散模型，将所得的分子间相互作用能纳入动力学模型以预测晶体形貌。

Result: 所开发的模拟程序（cgkmc）在应用于四硝基季戊四醇（PETN）时，与附着能模型显示出优异的一致性。

Conclusion: 该工作开发了一种有效的原子尺度模拟方法，可用于预测晶体形貌，并已成功应用于PETN材料。

Abstract: In this work, we develop an atomistic, graph-based kinetic Monte Carlo (KMC)
simulation routine to predict crystal morphology. Within this routine, we
encode the state of the supercell in a binary occupation vector and the
topology of the supercell in a simple nearest-neighbor graph. From this
encoding, we efficiently compute the interaction energy of the system as a
quadratic form of the binary occupation vector, representing pairwise
interactions. This encoding, coupled with a simple diffusion model for
adsorption, is then used to model evaporation and adsorption dynamics at
solid-liquid interfaces. The resulting intermolecular interaction-breaking
energies are incorporated into a kinetic model to predict crystal morphology,
which is implemented in the open-source Python package Crystal Growth Kinetic
Monte Carlo (cgkmc). We then apply this routine to pentaerythritol tetranitrate
(PETN), an important energetic material, showing excellent agreement with the
attachment energy model.

</details>


### [477] [Spin and Orbital Edelstein effect in gated monolayer transition metal dichalcogenides](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25634)
*Tapesh Gautam,S. Satpathy*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 该研究利用第一性原理密度泛函理论计算，在门控单层过渡金属硫族化合物（TMDs）中研究了轨道埃德尔斯坦效应（OEE）。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究埃德尔斯坦效应的轨道部分，特别是其在具有手性自旋/轨道角动量纹理的TMDs中的表现，并与电子部分进行比较。

Method: 使用第一性原理密度泛函计算，对电子和空穴掺杂的门控单层TMDs（如MoS2）进行了研究，并推导了自旋和轨道埃德尔斯坦磁化率的解析表达式。

Result: 发现电子掺杂时，埃德尔斯坦响应主要由轨道贡献主导；空穴掺杂时，轨道和自旋贡献相当。空穴掺杂时，应变能显著增强OEE和SEE。预测的TMDs中的OEE比先前报道的体系大一个数量级。

Conclusion: TMDs为研究OEE提供了有前景的平台，并在自旋电子学器件中具有潜在应用价值。

Abstract: The Edelstein effect consists of the non-equilibrium accumulation of
magnetization in response to an applied electric field in systems with broken
inversion symmetry. While the spin Edelstein effect (SEE), originating from
spin moments, is well established, its orbital counterpart, where magnetization
arises from orbital moment, has only recently begun to attract attention. In
this work, we investigate the orbital Edelstein effect (OEE) in gated monolayer
transition-metal dichalcogenides (TMDs), such as MoS2, by using
first-principles density-functional calculations with both electron and hole
doping. The gate-induced broken mirror symmetry produces a Rashba-type chiral
spin/orbital angular momentum texture, which in turn leads to the Edelstein
effect in response to an applied in-plane electric field. We find that for
electron doping the Edelstein response is dominated by the orbital channel,
whereas for hole doping the orbital and spin contributions are comparable. For
the case of hole doping, both OEE and SEE are strongly enhanced by a small
amount of strain, due to strain-driven shifts between the Gamma and K/K' valley
energies. We derive analytical expressions for the spin and orbital Edelstein
susceptibilities and evaluate their magnitudes from first-principles.
Remarkably, the predicted OEE in gated monolayer TMDs is an order of magnitude
larger than values reported in previously studied systems. Our results identify
TMDs as promising platforms for studying the orbital Edelstein effect and
highlight their potential applications in spintronics devices.

</details>


### [478] [Kinetics of the photochromic effect in oxygen-containing rare-earth hydrides](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25887)
*Dmitrii Moldarev,Tuan T. Tran,Max Wolff,Daniel Primetzhofer*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 该论文研究了含氧化物稀土金属氢化物的光致变色动力学，认为该反应是一个两步过程，而不是传统假设的单步过程。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统上，含氧化物稀土金属氢化物的光致变色动力学被描述为单步指数过程，但本研究旨在深入探讨其光致变色效应的起源，并提出一个更精确的两步模型。

Method: 通过将光致变色动力学视为一个由快速（如电子或局域过程）和缓慢（如扩散限制）两个过程组成的两步反应，并与实验数据进行拟合，来研究含氧化物稀土金属氢化物的光致变色效应。

Result: 研究表明，在含氧化物稀土金属氢化物的光致变色动力学中，假设存在一个快速的过程和一个缓慢的扩散限制过程，可以极大地改善与实验数据的拟合度。

Conclusion: 含氧化物稀土金属氢化物的光致变色效应起源于一个两步过程，包括一个快速的速率限制过程和一个缓慢的扩散限制过程，这比传统的单步模型能更好地解释实验现象。

Abstract: The kinetics of the photochromic reaction of oxygen-containing rare-earth
hydrides is commonly described by an exponential function assuming a
single-step process. In this paper, we elaborate on the origin of the
photochromic effect in oxygen-containing rare-earth metal hydrides, considering
the kinetics of the reaction as a two-step process. We show that the fit to the
experimental data is improved drastically when two processes that cause the
photodarkening are assumed: a fast reaction rate-limited - for example,
electronic or local - process and a slow, e.g. diffusion-limited process.

</details>


### [479] [Lithium depth profiling in NMC/Graphite commercial coin cells under high C-rate cycling](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25697)
*Naisargi Kanabar,Seiichiro Higashiya,Daniele Cherniak,Devendra Sadana,Stephen Bedell,Haralabos Efstathiadis*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 高倍率循环下锂离子电池正负极锂分布与演化


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究高倍率循环下锂离子电池中锂的损失、储存和电镀机制。

Method: 利用锂核反应分析 (Li-NRA)、X射线衍射 (XRD) 和配备能量色散X射线光谱 (EDS) 的扫描电子显微镜 (SEM) 对高C倍率循环后的商业锂离子扣式电池进行事后分析，测量锂在正负极中的深度分布。

Result: Li-NRA分析显示，负极表面存在锂峰，可能与SEI形成和锂电镀有关，而正极的锂含量减少约19.7%。XRD分析显示正极c轴晶格收缩，峰位移动，表明锂耗尽和结构变形。SEM成像支持了这一发现。死石墨负极在43.3°处出现增强峰，可能与金属锂或铜有关。3C倍率循环导致容量衰减和内阻增加。

Conclusion: 高倍率循环会导致锂离子电池正负极材料中锂的分布发生变化，锂的损失、储存和电镀是导致容量衰减和内阻增加的主要原因。

Abstract: This study examines lithium distribution and its evolution in both anode and
cathode materials of commercial lithium-ion coin cells subjected to high C-rate
cycling, providing insights into lithium loss, trapping, and plating
mechanisms. Cells were cycled at 1C to 3C rates, and post-mortem analysis were
performed using Li nuclear reaction Analysis (Li-NRA), x-ray diffraction (XRD),
and scanning electron microscopy (SEM) equipped with energy-dispersive x-ray
spectroscopy (EDS). Li-NRA using the resonant nuclear reaction between an
incident high-energy proton and lithium was used to measure the depth
distribution of Li in the cathode and anode layers. The Li-NRA analysis
revealed a surface lithium peak on the anode, likely associated with SEI
formation and lithium plating, while the cathode exhibited a decrease in
lithium content by ~19.7%. XRD analysis of the cathode showed a contraction of
the c-lattice parameter and peak shifts consistent with lithium depletion and
structural deformation, supported by SEM imaging. In contrast, the dead
graphite anode shows an enhanced peak at 43.3{\deg}, which corresponds to the
presence of metallic lithium or possibly Cu. 3-C rate cycling also led to
capacity fade and an increase in internal resistance, highlighting the impact
of lithium plating on cell performance.

</details>


### [480] [Discovery of oxide Li-conducting electrolytes in uncharted chemical space via topology-constrained crystal structure prediction](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25763)
*Seungwoo Hwang,Jiho Lee,Seungwu Han,Youngho Kang,Sungwoo Kang*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: TOPIC算法通过引入角共享（CS）键拓扑约束来简化氧化物固态电解质（SSE）的结构预测，成功预测了已知氧化物SSE的结构，并发现了92种具有CS骨架的新型候选材料，其中Li4Hf2Si3O12表现出优异的导电性和稳定性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 氧化物SSEs具有优异的化学和热稳定性，但离子电导率通常低于硫化物和氯化物，因此需要寻找具有更高电导率的新型氧化物材料。

Method: 提出TOPIC算法，通过强制执行角共享（CS）键拓扑约束来降低构型复杂性，并结合预训练的机器学习原子间势能进行系统筛选。

Result: TOPIC算法成功重现了已知氧化物SSEs（如LiTa2PO8和Li7La3Zr2O12）的基态和亚稳态结构。通过结合机器学习势能，筛选出92种具有CS骨架的候选材料，其中Li4Hf2Si3O12表现出14 mS cm-1的离子电导率、21 meV atom-1的稳定性和6.5 eV的带隙。

Conclusion: 所提出的方法为在未探索的化学空间中发现高性能氧化物固体电解质提供了一条实用且可扩展的途径，并发现锂含量是决定CS结构稳定性的关键因素之一。

Abstract: Oxide Li-conducting solid-state electrolytes (SSEs) offer excellent chemical
and thermal stability but typically exhibit lower ionic conductivity than
sulfides and chlorides. This motivates the search for new oxide materials with
enhanced conductivity. Crystal structure prediction is a powerful approach for
identifying such candidates. However, the structural complexity of oxide SSEs,
often involving unit cells with more than 100 atoms, presents significant
challenges for conventional methods. In this study, we introduce TOPIC, a
structure prediction algorithm that reduces configurational complexity by
enforcing corner-sharing (CS) bond topology constraints. We demonstrate that
TOPIC successfully reproduces the ground-state and metastable structures of
known oxide SSEs, including LiTa$_2$PO$_8$ and Li$_7$La$_3$Zr$_2$O$_{12}$,
which contain up to about 200 atoms per unit cell. By combining this approach
with a pretrained machine-learning interatomic potential, we systematically
screen quaternary oxide compositions and identify 92 promising candidates with
CS frameworks. In particular, Li$_4$Hf$_2$Si$_3$O$_{12}$, which corresponds to
the ground state at its composition, exhibits an ionic conductivity of 14 mS
cm$^{-1}$, a hull energy of 21 meV atom$^{-1}$, and a band gap of 6.5 eV.
Through our investigation, we identify the Li ratio as one of the key factors
determining the stability of CS structures. Overall, our approach provides a
practical and scalable pathway for discovering high-performance oxide solid
electrolytes in previously unexplored chemical spaces.

</details>


### [481] [Fine-Tuning Bulk-oriented Universal Interatomic Potentials for Surfaces: Accuracy, Efficiency, and Forgetting Control](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25807)
*Jaekyun Hwang,Taehun Lee,Yonghyuk Lee,Su-Hyun Yoo*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 通过微调机器学习势能（MLP）来提高表面建模的计算效率和预测准确性，并提出多头微调方法以增强泛化能力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有方法计算成本高且大多仅基于体相系统，无法满足表面建模需求。

Method: 对现有通用机器学习势能（UIP）进行微调，并系统比较了从头训练、零样本推理、常规微调和多头微调方法。

Result: 微调显著减少了训练数据量和预测误差，多头微调在超出训练域的材料上也能提供鲁棒且可泛化的预测。

Conclusion: 微调预训练的MLP可以加速表面建模，并为数据高效的原子尺度模拟提供可扩展的途径。

Abstract: Accurate prediction of surface energies and stabilities is essential for
materials design, yet first-principles calculations remain computationally
expensive and most existing interatomic potentials are trained only on bulk
systems. Here, we demonstrate that fine-tuning foundation machine learning
potentials (MLPs) significantly improves both computational efficiency and
predictive accuracy for surface modeling. While existing universal interatomic
potentials (UIPs) have been solely trained and validated on bulk datasets, we
extend their applicability to complex and scientifically significant unary,
binary, and ternary surface systems. We systematically compare models trained
from scratch, zero-shot inference, conventional fine-tuning, and multi-head
fine-tuning approach that enhances transferability and mitigates catastrophic
forgetting. Fine-tuning consistently reduces prediction errors with
orders-of-magnitude fewer training configurations, and multi-head fine-tuning
delivers robust and generalizable predictions even for materials beyond the
initial training domain. These findings offer practical guidance for leveraging
pre-trained MLPs to accelerate surface modeling and highlight a scalable path
toward data-efficient, next-generation atomic-scale simulations in
computational materials science.

</details>


### [482] [Antiferromagnetic domain walls under spin-orbit torque](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.22241)
*George Theodorou,Stavros Komineas*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: Antiferromagnetic domain walls exhibit dynamics tunable by spin-polarized current, with different behaviors for perpendicular (precessional) and in-plane (propagating) polarizations. Analytical and numerical methods reveal velocity-dependent profiles and potential for large magnetization, with oscillatory motion observed for combined polarization components.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The paper investigates the dynamics of domain walls in antiferromagnets subjected to spin-polarized currents, highlighting phenomena not seen in ferromagnets and exploring tunability via current polarization.

Method: The study employs a perturbation method for low velocities to determine the velocity-current relationship and analyze wall profiles, alongside direct numerical solutions for high velocities to capture main profile features. An analytical description is provided for oscillatory motion arising from combined in-plane and perpendicular spin polarization components.

Result: Perpendicular spin polarization leads to precessional dynamics, while in-plane polarization results in propagating walls. The velocity is analyzed as a function of current for low velocities, and wall profiles are found to lack definite parity. For high velocities, key wall profile characteristics are obtained. The magnetization of dynamical walls can be significant, suggesting a possible observation method. Oscillatory motion is achieved with mixed polarization components, and an analytical model is presented.

Conclusion: Domain walls in antiferromagnets display complex dynamics governed by spin-polarized currents. The current polarization dictates the type of motion (precessional or propagating). The observed wall profiles and magnetization characteristics offer potential avenues for experimental detection and further research into antiferromagnetic spintronics.

Abstract: Domain walls in antiferromagnets under a spin-polarized current present rich
dynamics that is not observed in ferromagnets, and it is tunable by the current
polarization. Precessional dynamics is obtained for perpendicular spin
polarization, in agreement with expectations in older works. Propagating walls
are obtained for an in-plane polarization. We obtain the velocity as a function
of current by a perturbation method for low velocities, and the wall profile is
found to lack a definite parity. For high velocities, the main features of the
wall profile are obtained by a direct solution of an equation that is valid in
a limiting case. We discuss the magnetization of the dynamical walls and find
that this can become large, providing a potential method for observations.
Oscillatory motion of domain walls is obtained for spin polarization that has
both perpendicular and in-plane components, and an analytical description is
given.

</details>


### [483] [Revealing Hidden Antiparallel Domains in Hexagonal Boron Nitride](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25910)
*Yeri Lee,Juseung Oh,Kyung Yeol Ma,Seung Jin Lee,Eui Young Jung,Yani Wang,Kenji Watanabe,Takashi Taniguchi,Hailin Peng,Hiroki Ago,Ki Kang Kim,Hyeon Suk Shin,Sunmin Ryu*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: hBN晶体质量的大面积评估是一个基本挑战，通常需要光学方法进行无损探测。 本研究介绍了一种基于干涉二次谐波产生（SHG）偏振测量的方法，用于探测hBN中的晶格取向和结构完整性，揭示了反平行域的形成并量化了它们对晶体有序度的影响。 SHG强度也可作为畴无序度的直接光学指标，并与拉曼光谱相关联，为评估晶体质量提供了一个统一的框架。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 评估hBN晶体质量的大面积制备是一个基本挑战，特别是对于在非中心对称二维材料中光学探测的抗平行域和取向域。

Method: 干涉二次谐波产生（SHG）偏振测量。

Result: SHG偏振测量能够探测hBN中的晶格取向和结构完整性，揭示了反平行域的普遍形成，并量化了它们对晶体有序度的影响。 SHG强度可以作为畴无序度的直接光学指标，并且与拉曼光谱相关联。

Conclusion: 干涉二次谐波产生（SHG）偏振测量是一种强大的、非破坏性的工具，用于评估hBN中的晶体质量，并为其他非中心对称二维材料提供高通量、大面积结构成像的方法。

Abstract: Hexagonal boron nitride (hBN) supports a wide range of two-dimensional (2D)
technologies, yet assessing its crystalline quality over large areas remains a
fundamental challenge. Both antiparallel domains, an intrinsic outcome of
epitaxy on high-symmetry substrates, and orientational domains have long evaded
optical detection. Here, we show that interferometric second-harmonic
generation (SHG) polarimetry provides a powerful, non-destructive probe of
lattice orientation and structural integrity in chemical vapor deposition-grown
hBN. This approach reveals the ubiquitous formation of antiparallel domains and
quantifies their impact on crystalline order. SHG intensity also emerges as a
direct optical metric of domain disorder, spanning three orders of magnitude
across films produced by ten different growth routes. Correlation with Raman
spectroscopy establishes a unified framework for evaluating crystalline
quality. Beyond hBN, this method offers a high-throughput route to wide-area
structural imaging in other non-centrosymmetric 2D materials, advancing their
deployment in electronics, photonics, and quantum technologies.

</details>


### [484] [Accelerated Discovery of High-\k{appa} Oxides with Physics-Based Factorized Machine Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26022)
*Atsushi Takigawa,Shin Kiyohara,Yu Kumagai*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 使用结合了等变图神经网络和预训练ML势的联合ML模型，提高了高κ材料中离子电介质贡献的预测精度，并发现了38种新型高κ氧化物。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 高κ材料因其高介电常数和宽带隙的特性而备受关注，但机器学习（ML）在预测其离子贡献方面存在挑战，这严重影响了预测的准确性。

Method: 提出一个联合ML模型，其中等变图神经网络用于预测Born有效电荷，高精度预训练ML势用于预测声子性质，然后从这些量解析计算离子电介质张量。

Result: 该方法显著提高了离子贡献的预测精度，并成功从8000多个候选材料中筛选出38种新型高κ氧化物。

Conclusion: 所提出的联合ML模型能够准确预测高κ材料的离子电介质贡献，并有效地发现新型高κ材料。

Abstract: Considerable effort continues to be devoted to the exploration of
next-generation high-\k{appa} materials that combine a high dielectric constant
with a wide band gap. However, machine learning (ML)-based virtual screening
has remained challenging, primarily due to the low accuracy in predicting the
ionic contribution to the dielectric tensor, which dominates the dielectric
performance of high-\k{appa} materials. We here propose a joint ML model that
predicts Born effective charges using an equivariant graph neural network, and
phonon properties using a highly accurate pretrained ML potential. The ionic
dielectric tensor is then computed analytically from these quantities. This
approach significantly improves the accuracy of ionic contribution. Using the
proposed model, we successfully identified 38 novel high-\k{appa} oxides from a
screening pool of over 8,000 candidates.

</details>


### [485] [Topological Textures in Zr-Substituted Barium Titanate](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26023)
*Florian Mayer*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 锆-钛酸钡(BZT)中的拓扑极化结构可用于多状态、可重构设备。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 铁电体中的拓扑极化纹理为密集内存、神经形态计算和固体拓扑的受控探测提供了途径。

Method: 本文使用第一性原理参数化有效哈密顿框架，将研究范围扩展到锆取代钛酸钡(BZT)。

Result: 在 12.5% 的有序组合中，化学加倍的周期性强制沿 [111] 方向交替：一半容纳 -2 反斯格明子（六个 -1/3 夸克），另一半容纳 +4 斯格明子（六个 +2/3 夸克）。两种斯格明子共享相同的六涡旋骨架，但在平面积分切片电荷上每个涡旋相差整数 +1。在随机 BZT 中，纳米畴仍然可以诱导并在低温下稳定，但淬灭的无序钉扎和扭曲涡旋，产生具有拓扑电荷轴向波动的异质斯格明子玻璃状状态。热稳定性图显示纯 BT 在 ~100 K 下保留 -2 纹理，而在 BZT 中，临界温度随 6-8% Zr 附近出现最小值而非单调变化，这反映了铁电软化和无序钉扎之间的竞争。值得注意的是，12.5% 的有序排列在 300 K 以上保持菱形，从而在 293 K 下实现场稳定纳米畴。在局部 [111] 偏压下，有序系统携带 +4 切片电荷，而随机组合在相同条件下分裂。

Conclusion: 本文的研究结果表明，BZT 是一种可在低温到室温下实现化学编程、分数化铁电拓扑的平台，并为多状态、可重构设备提供了途径。

Abstract: Topological polarization textures in ferroelectrics offer pathways to dense
memory, neuromorphic computing, and controlled probes of topology in solids. In
rhombohedral barium titanate, theory has identified stable antiskyrmions of
topological charge -2 that fractionalize into six -1/3 fractional hotspots,
termed topological quarks. Here we extend this landscape to Zr-substituted
barium titanate (BZT) using a first-principles parameterized
effective-Hamiltonian framework. In an ordered 12.5% composition, the
chemically doubled periodicity enforces an alternation along [111]: one half
hosts the -2 antiskyrmion (six -1/3 quarks), the other a +4 skyrmion (six +2/3
quarks). The two share the same six-vortex skeleton but differ by an integer +1
per vortex in the plane-integrated slice charge. In random BZT, nanodomains
remain inducible and cryogenically stable, yet quenched disorder pins and
distorts the vortices, producing a heterogeneous, skyrmion-glass like state
with fluctuations of the topological charge along the axis. Thermal stability
maps show that pure BT retains -2 textures up to ~100 K, whereas in BZT the
critical temperature is nonmonotonic, with a minimum near 6-8% Zr, reflecting
competition between ferroelectric softening and disorder pinning. Importantly,
the 12.5% ordered arrangement remains rhombohedral above 300 K, enabling
field-stabilized nanodomains at 293 K. Under a local [111] bias, the ordered
system carries +4 slice charge, while the random composition fragments under
the same conditions. These results establish BZT as a platform for chemically
programmed, fractionalized ferroelectric topology from cryogenic to room
temperature and suggest routes to multistate, reconfigurable devices.

</details>


### [486] [Exact heat flux formula and its spectral decomposition in molecular dynamics for arbitrary many-body potentials](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26044)
*Markos Poulos,Donatas Surblys,Konstantinos Termentzidis*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种计算分子动力学中热通量及其光谱分解的精确框架，适用于任意多体势能，解决了现有方法的局限性，并能准确模拟多体系统的热力学性质。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的分子动力学热通量计算方法存在局限性，无法精确处理多体势能和广泛的材料体系。

Method: 推导了计算热通量及其光谱分解的精确框架，并使用Green-Kubo和非平衡分子动力学模拟在Tersoff和Stillinger-Weber势下进行了测试，计算了单层石墨烯和MoS2在不同系统长度下的热通量光谱分解。

Result: 所提出的方法计算的热通量与非平衡分子动力学模拟中的温控器电流一致，优于现有方法在热导率估算上的表现。热通量分解揭示了不同声子模式对热导率的贡献及其长度依赖性。

Conclusion: 该方法已实现为LAMMPS代码的一部分，适用于大多数多体分子动力学势能，为研究材料热力学性质提供了精确的计算工具。

Abstract: In this study we have derived an exact framework for the calculation of the
heat flux and its spectral decomposition in Molecular Dynamics (MD) for
arbitrary many-body potentials. This work addresses several lacks and
limitations of previous approaches and allows for the accurate computational
study of thermal properties in a wide variety of many-body systems with MD. We
have tested our modifications with Green-Kubo (GK) and Non-Equilibrium MD
(NEMD) simulations for various 2D and 3D material systems using the Tersoff and
Stillinger-Weber potentials as examples. The spectral decomposition of the heat
current was also calculated for monolayer graphene (1LG) and MoS2 , for
different system lengths. Our results show that the heat current calculated by
our method is consistently in agreement with the thermostat current in NEMD,
while previous implementations can estimate quite poorly the thermal
conductivity both under GK and NEMD simulations, and both for 2D and 3D
materials. The decomposition of the heat current also sheds light on the
contribution of different phonon modes to thermal conductivity and its
dependence on length. Our methodology is implemented in the widely used LAMMPS
code specifically for the Tersoff and SW potentials, and it is readily
applicable to the vast majority of many-body MD potentials.

</details>


### [487] [Field-tuning of ultrafast magnetization fluctuations in Sm$_{0.7}$Er$_{0.3}$FeO$_{3}$](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26084)
*Marvin Alexander Weiss,Julius Schlegel,Daniel Anić,Emil Steiner,Franz Stefan Herbst,Makoto Nakajima,Takayuki Kurihara,Alfred Leitenstorfer,Ulrich Nowak,Sebastian T. B. Goennenwein*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: FemNoC技术被用于研究自旋重取向转变和外磁场下Sm$_{0.7}$Er$_{0.3}$FeO$_{3}$的磁化起伏，发现自旋起伏幅度受自由能控制，外磁场可抑制自旋起伏并提高准铁磁磁声子频率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 自旋起伏在超快时间尺度下的性质，尤其是在反铁磁体中，仍有待探索。

Method: 采用飞秒噪声相关光谱（FemNoC）实验研究磁化起伏，并与原子自旋噪声和蒙特卡洛模拟进行对比。

Result: 自旋起伏的幅度由自由能决定，势能软化区域起伏更强；外磁场可抑制自旋起伏，并通过有效加强势能来提高准铁磁磁声子频率。

Conclusion: 外部参数（如磁场）为调节超快磁化起伏提供了一条有效途径。

Abstract: The properties of spin fluctuations in antiferromagnets are largely
unexplored, in particular at ultrafast timescales. Here, we employ femtosecond
noise correlation spectroscopy (FemNoC) to experimentally study magnetization
fluctuations in the canted antiferromagnet Sm$_{0.7}$Er$_{0.3}$FeO$_{3}$ across
its spin reorientation transition and under external magnetic fields. By
comparing our measurements to atomistic spin noise and Monte Carlo simulations,
we find that the amplitude of the spin noise is governed by the free energy,
with stronger fluctuations in regions where the potential landscape softens. We
furthermore demonstrate that external magnetic fields suppress spin
fluctuations and enhance the quasi-ferromagnetic magnon frequency by
effectively stiffening the potential. These results highlight an effective
route for tuning ultrafast magnetization fluctuations via external parameters.

</details>


### [488] [The diffusion-driven orthorhombic to tetragonal transition in YBa$_2$Cu$_3$O$_7$ derived with a machine learning interatomic potential](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26095)
*Davide Gambino,Niccolò Di Eugenio,Jesper Byggmästar,Johan Klarbring,Daniele Torsello,Flyura Djurabekova,Francesco Laviano*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 本论文开发了一种基于ACE方法的机器学习势，用于模拟YBCO中的缺陷及其动力学，特别是氧空位和氧填隙对缺陷的扩散机制。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 由于高温超导体YBCO中缺陷对其超导行为有关键影响，且在严酷辐射环境下（如聚变反应堆和粒子加速器）的超导体应用需求增加，因此有必要进行精确的原子尺度缺陷建模。

Method: 利用原子簇展开（ACE）方法，并基于密度泛函理论（DFT）数据，开发了一种通用的机器学习原子间势，并着重于缺陷及其扩散机制。

Result: 该势能能准确预测YBCO的基态性质、氧弗伦克尔缺陷的形成能及其扩散势垒，并能捕捉到高温下的扩散驱动的斜方晶向四方晶相转变，这是传统经验势难以实现的。本研究证明了机器学习势能适用于研究具有复杂化学性质的四元氧化物。

Conclusion: 所提出的ACE势能能够实现YBCO中缺陷动力学和输运过程的大规模预测性原子尺度模拟，为探索其在实际工况下的稳定性、性能和功能提供了有力工具。

Abstract: Defects in high temperature superconductors such as YBa$_2$Cu$_3$O$_7$ (YBCO)
critically influence their superconducting behavior, as they substantially
degrade or even suppress superconductivity. With the renewed interest in
cuprates for next-generation superconducting magnets operating in
radiation-harsh environments such as fusion reactors and particle accelerators,
accurate atomistic modeling of defects and their dynamics has become essential.
Here, we present a general-purpose machine-learning interatomic potential for
YBCO, based on the Atomic Cluster Expansion (ACE) method and trained on Density
Functional Theory (DFT) data, with particular emphasis on defects and their
diffusion mechanisms. The potential is validated against DFT calculations of
ground-state properties, defect formation energies of oxygen Frenkel pairs and
diffusion barriers for their formation. Remarkably, the potential captures the
diffusion-driven orthorhombic to tetragonal transition at elevated
temperatures, a transformation that is difficult to describe with empirical
potentials, elucidating how the formation of oxygen Frenkel pairs in the basal
plane governs this order-disorder transition. The ACE potential introduced here
enables large-scale, predictive atomistic simulations of defect dynamics and
transport processes in YBCO, providing a powerful tool to explore its
stability, performance, and functionality under realistic operating conditions.
Moreover, this work proves that machine learning interatomic potentials are
suitable for studies of quaternary oxides with complex chemistry.

</details>


### [489] [Towards stable metal inorganic-organic complex glasses](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26288)
*Tianzhao Xu,Zhencai Li,Kai Zheng,Hanmeng Zhang,Kenji Shinozaki,Huotian Zhang,Lars R. Jensen,Feng Gao,Jinjun Ren,Yanfei Zhang,Yuanzheng Yue*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 通过溶剂缓慢移除和后续淬灭的方法制备了金属无机-有机杂化（MIOC）玻璃，克服了MIOC前驱体在熔融前分解的难题，并发现了氢键在MIOC玻璃形成中的关键作用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 开发一种新的制备金属无机-有机杂化（MIOC）玻璃的方法，以克服现有方法中前驱体在熔融前分解的挑战，并扩大MIOC玻璃的成分范围。

Method: 采用非质子溶剂（丙酮）缓慢移除结合后续淬灭的方法，通过动力学阻止金属-配体络合物分子的有序化，形成凝胶，然后通过溶剂移除增强分子间的氢键连接，形成氢键网络，最后通过快速淬灭获得MIOC玻璃。

Result: 成功制备了MIOC玻璃，并发现氢键是连接四面体单元的关键。所制备的MIOC玻璃表现出一些特性，例如玻璃化转变温度（Tg）随室温弛豫而升高、CO2吸附能力以及光致发光红移。

Conclusion: 提出了一种制备大尺寸、稳定、功能性MIOC玻璃的新策略，并揭示了氢键在MIOC玻璃形成中的关键作用。

Abstract: Metal inorganic-organic complex (MIOC) glasses have emerged as a new family
of melt-quenched glasses. However, the vitrification of MIOC is challenging
since most of the crystalline MIOC precursors decompose before melting. The
decomposition problem severely narrows the compositional range of MIOC glass
formation. Here, we report a novel approach for preparing the MIOC glasses that
combines slow-solvent-removal with subsequent quenching to avoid gel thermal
decomposition and crystallization. Specifically, the new approach utilizes an
aprotic solvent (acetone) to kinetically prevent the ordering of the
metal-ligand complex molecules in solution, thereby suppressing crystallization
and forming a gel. The subsequent gradual drying process leads to the removal
of the solvent to enhance the connections between molecules through hydrogen
bonds, thus causing the formation of a hydrogen-bonded network. The increased
network connectivity lowers the mobility of the molecules, thereby avoiding gel
crystallization. Consequently, a disordered network is frozen-in during
quenching of the dried gel from 130 {\deg}C to room temperature, and finally
MIOC glass forms. Structural analyses reveal that hydrogen bonds are
responsible for connecting the tetrahedral units. The as-prepared MIOC glass
exhibits some fascinating behaviors, e.g., Tg increasing with rapid
room-temperature relaxation, CO2 uptake, and red-shift of photoluminescence.
This work not only presents a novel strategy for fabricating large-sized,
stable, functional MIOC glasses, but also uncovers the critical role of
hydrogen bonds in MIOC glass formation.

</details>


### [490] [MoSe2 and WSe2 shell morphology control via temperature optimization during two-step growth of ZnSe-based core-shell nanowires](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26312)
*Luize Dipane,Liora Kotlara,Viktors Vibornijs,Katrina Laganovska,Aleksejs Zolotarjovs,Eriks Dipans,Jevgenijs Gabrusenoks,Boris Polyakov,Edgars Butanovs*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 通过两步法成功制备了ZnSe-MoSe2和ZnSe-WSe2核壳纳米线，并通过优化硒化工艺温度来控制TMD壳的形貌，为先进的纳米级应用提供了新的途径。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 实现均匀可控的过渡金属二硫属化物（TMD）壳在纳米线（NWs）上的生长是开发高质量核壳异质结构用于光电和光催化应用的关键挑战。

Method: 首先通过汽-液-固生长机制制备ZnSe纳米线，然后通过磁控溅射沉积氧化物牺牲层，最后在化学气相传输反应器中进行硒化处理，制备ZnSe-MoSe2和ZnSe-WSe2核壳纳米线。

Result: 成功制备了ZnSe-MoSe2和ZnSe-WSe2核壳纳米线，并通过X射线衍射、透射电子显微镜、X射线光电子能谱、拉曼光谱和光致发光光谱进行了表征。研究发现，TMD壳的形貌可以通过优化硒化工艺温度来控制，这源于不同的生长机制。

Conclusion: 所研究的趋势可以进一步扩展到其他半导体纳米线和TMD核壳异质结构的生长，为先进的纳米级应用提供了有前景的方向。

Abstract: Achieving uniform and controlled transition metal dichalcogenide (TMD) shell
growth on nanowires (NWs) remains a key challenge, limiting the development of
high-quality core-shell heterostructures for optoelectronic and photocatalytic
applications. In this work, the fabrication of ZnSe-MoSe2 and ZnSe-WSe2
core-shell NWs was successfully demonstrated. ZnSe NWs were grown via the
vapor-liquid-solid growth mechanism, while TMD (MoSe2 or WSe2) shells were
formed through a two-step process of sacrificial oxide layer deposition via
magnetron sputtering followed by selenization process in a chemical vapor
transport reactor. As-grown nanostructures were characterized using X-ray
diffraction, transmission electron microscopy, X-ray photoelectron
spectroscopy, Raman spectroscopy and photoluminescence spectroscopy. It was
observed that the TMD shell morphology can be controlled through the
selenization process temperature optimization, which arises due to different
growth mechanisms discussed here. The studied trends could be further extended
to other semiconductor NW and TMD core-shell heterostructure growth, offering
promising avenues for advanced nanoscale applications.

</details>


### [491] [Strain-Gradient-Driven Decoupling of Thermal Suppression from Anisotropy in \b{eta}-Ga2O3](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26412)
*Guangwu Zhang,Xing Xiang,Ziyan Qian,Yixin Xu,Shengying Yue,Hyejin Jang,Lin Yang,Yanguang Zhou,Xinyu Wang,Qiye Zheng*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 应变梯度能有效抑制{eta}-Ga2O3的热导率，并且优于均匀应变和其它材料。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 应变梯度是柔性器件和外延纳米结构中的普遍现象，对于{eta}-Ga2O3的热输运是一个重要的研究盲点。

Method: 研究不同单轴和双轴应变梯度对{eta}-Ga2O3薄膜和纳米线热导率的影响，并与均匀应变和其它材料进行比较，同时分析其微观机制。

Result: 在中等单轴应变梯度（0.6%/nm）下，{eta}-Ga2O3薄膜和纳米线的 k 分别降低了 32-37% 和 27-30%，在双轴应变梯度下甚至能达到 43.3%。应变梯度带来的抑制效果远超均匀应变，并且优于硅和 BAs 等基准材料。此外，研究发现应变梯度在强烈抑制 k 的同时，能保持热失配比不变。

Conclusion: 应变梯度是调控{eta}-Ga2O3热学性质的有效设计工具，可用于下一代柔性及大功率电子器件的热隔离和热通量工程。

Abstract: Strain gradients, ubiquitous in flexible devices and epitaxial
nanostructures, are a major blind spot for thermal transport in \b{eta}-Ga2O3.
We establish that strain gradient unlocks a thermal conductivity (k)
suppression mechanism fundamentally more potent than uniform strain: moderate
uniaxial gradients (0.6%/nm) suppress k by 32-37% (27-30%) in thin films
(nanowires), intensifying to 43.3% with biaxial gradients. This reduction far
exceeds that from equivalent uniform strain and surpasses benchmark materials
like silicon and BAs. Critically, a surprising decoupling emerges: while 3%
uniform strain alters thermal anisotropy by ~25%, strain gradient strongly
suppresses k with preserving this ratio. Mechanistically, strain
gradients-induced symmetry breaking and enhanced mode coupling anisotropically
activate forbidden scattering channels, making gradient-driven scattering
dominant over intrinsic phonon scattering below 6.25 THz. These findings
redefine non-uniform strain from a parasitic flaw into a powerful design tool
for engineering thermal isolation and heat flux in next-generation flexible and
high-power \b{eta}-Ga2O3 electronics.

</details>


### [492] [Peculiarities of spin dynamics excitation by magnetic field of a high-frequency electromagnetic pulse](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26528)
*Nika Gribova,Anatoly Zvezdin,Vladimir Belotelov*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: Circularly polarized THz fields can excite spin precession by acting as a rectified magnetic field, while short pulses of any polarization can also induce spin dynamics. The optimal pulse duration for maximizing spin precession depends on various magnetic and pulse parameters.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Understanding the role of circular polarization and time-dependent field profiles in THz-induced spin dynamics for ultrafast manipulation of magnetization.

Method: Developed a unified theoretical framework to describe spin precession excitation by high-frequency THz pulses of arbitrary polarization and Gaussian temporal profile.

Result: Circularly polarized fields act as rectified fields for long pulses, linear polarization does not excite free precession in this regime. Short pulses of any polarization can excite free spin precession, with an optimal duration dependent on sample and pulse parameters.

Conclusion: THz-induced spin dynamics are effectively excited by tailored electromagnetic pulses, offering insights for light-controlled magnetization schemes.

Abstract: Terahertz (THz) electromagnetic pulses offer a promising route for the
ultrafast manipulation of magnetization in ferromagnetic materials. While
previous studies have demonstrated the excitation of spin dynamics using
linearly polarized THz fields, the role of circular polarization and the
effects of rapidly oscillating, time-dependent field profiles remained
insufficiently understood. We have developed a unified theoretical framework
for describing the excitation of spin precession via Zeeman interaction in
magnetic materials by high frequency pulses of arbitrary polarization with
temporal Gaussian profile. In the regime of long pulses (at least several
oscillations are within the pulse duration), a circularly polarized magnetic
field acts as an effective rectified magnetic field along the pulse
propagation, while linear polarized pulses excite no free precession. In the
regime of short pulses (less than one oscillation is within the pulse
duration), pulses of any polarization, including linear one can excite free
spin precession. There is an optimal pulse duration which maximizes amplitude
of the spin precession. It depends on magnetic parameters of the sample and the
external magnetic field, as well as on the carrier frequency of the pulse and
its amplitude. These findings bridge key gaps in the understanding of
THz-induced spin dynamics and provide insights into the design of
light-controlled magnetization schemes using tailored electromagnetic pulses.

</details>


### [493] [Automated and Scalable SEM Image Analysis of Perovskite Solar Cell Materials via a Deep Segmentation Framework](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26548)
*Jian Guo Pan,Lin Wang,Xia Cai*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种名为PerovSegNet的自动化深度学习框架，用于分割扫描电子显微镜（SEM）图像，以识别和量化钙钛矿太阳能电池制造中的碘化铅和钙钛矿相。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 准确识别和量化碘化铅和钙钛矿相对于钙钛矿太阳能电池的制造至关重要，因为残留的碘化铅会影响结晶路径和缺陷形成，而钙钛矿晶粒的形态则决定了载流子传输和器件稳定性。然而，当前的SEM图像分析在很大程度上是手动的，限制了吞吐量和一致性。

Method: 提出了一种基于改进的YOLOv8x架构的自动化深度学习框架PerovSegNet，该框架包含两个新模块：(i)自适应洗牌膨胀卷积块，通过分组卷积和通道混合增强多尺度和细粒度特征提取；(ii)可分离自适应下采样模块，联合保留细尺度纹理和大尺度结构，以实现更鲁棒的边界识别。该模型在一个包含10,994张SEM图像的增强数据集上进行训练。

Result: PerovSegNet在包含10,994张SEM图像的增强数据集上训练后，实现了87.25%的平均精度（mAP），计算量为265.4 Giga Floating Point Operations，其性能比基线YOLOv8x-seg提高了4.08%，同时模型尺寸和计算负荷分别减少了24.43%和25.22%。此外，该框架还能提供碘化铅/钙钛矿面积和数量等量化晶粒级指标。

Conclusion: PerovSegNet通过实现对SEM图像的精确高效分割，为识别碘化铅、钙钛矿和缺陷域提供了自动化解决方案，克服了传统手动分析的局限性。该框架不仅提高了分析精度和效率，还通过提供量化晶粒级指标，为评估结晶效率和微观结构质量提供了可靠的指示。这使得PerovSegNet成为钙钛矿薄膜制造中实时过程监控和数据驱动优化的可扩展工具。

Abstract: Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM) is indispensable for characterizing the
microstructure of thin films during perovskite solar cell fabrication. Accurate
identification and quantification of lead iodide and perovskite phases are
critical because residual lead iodide strongly influences crystallization
pathways and defect formation, while the morphology of perovskite grains
governs carrier transport and device stability. Yet current SEM image analysis
is still largely manual, limiting throughput and consistency. Here, we present
an automated deep learning-based framework for SEM image segmentation that
enables precise and efficient identification of lead iodide, perovskite and
defect domains across diverse morphologies. Built upon an improved YOLOv8x
architecture, our model named PerovSegNet incorporates two novel modules: (i)
Adaptive Shuffle Dilated Convolution Block, which enhances multi-scale and
fine-grained feature extraction through group convolutions and channel mixing;
and (ii) Separable Adaptive Downsampling module, which jointly preserves
fine-scale textures and large-scale structures for more robust boundary
recognition. Trained on an augmented dataset of 10,994 SEM images, PerovSegNet
achieves a mean Average Precision of 87.25% with 265.4 Giga Floating Point
Operations, outperforming the baseline YOLOv8x-seg by 4.08%, while reducing
model size and computational load by 24.43% and 25.22%, respectively. Beyond
segmentation, the framework provides quantitative grain-level metrics, such as
lead iodide/perovskite area and count, which can serve as reliable indicators
of crystallization efficiency and microstructural quality. These capabilities
establish PerovSegNet as a scalable tool for real-time process monitoring and
data-driven optimization of perovskite thin-film fabrication.The source code is
available at:https://github.com/wlyyj/PerovSegNet/tree/master.

</details>


### [494] [Effect of Mixed Ratios of Mangosteen Peel (Garcinia mangostana L.) and Grass Jelly Leaf (Cyclea barbata L. Miers) Natural Dyes on the Performance of Dye-Sensitized Solar Cells (DSSC)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26622)
*Eka Nurfani,Haifa Salsabila,Dwiky I. Bakhtiar,Wahyu S. Sipahutar,M Alvien Ghifari,Rishal Asri,Meqorry Yusfi,Tarmizi Taher,Aditya Rianjanu,Robi Kurniawan*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 综合利用天然染料（山竹皮和仙草叶）制备染料敏化太阳能电池，通过调整染料比例优化光电性能，其中山竹皮:仙草叶=1:3时效率最高，达到3.50%。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探索不同比例的山竹皮（MP）和仙草叶（GJL）天然染料对染料敏化太阳能电池（DSSCs）的光学、形貌及光伏特性的影响，以期提高电池效率。

Method: 制备不同体积比（3:1, 2:1, 1:1, 1:2, 1:3）的MP和GJL混合染料溶液，并以此制备DSSCs，然后通过UV-Vis吸收光谱、电流-电压（J-V）曲线等分析其性能。

Result: MP染料吸收紫外-蓝色光（350-450 nm），GJL染料吸收红色光（650-700 nm）。MP染料和GJL染料单独使用时的光电转换效率（PCE）分别为2.75%和2.12%。MP:GJL体积比为1:3的复合染料电池效率最高，达到3.50%。

Conclusion: 山竹皮和仙草叶复合染料能够拓宽吸收光谱，表现出协同效应，其中1:3的比例可获得最佳的光电转换效率。

Abstract: Dye-sensitized solar cells (DSSCs) are promising low-cost and environmentally
friendly photovoltaic devices, especially when utilizing natural sensitizers.
This study explores the effect of concentration ratios of natural dyes
extracted from mangosteen peel (MP) and grass jelly leaves (GJL) on the
optical, morphological, and photovoltaic properties of DSSCs. Dye solutions
were prepared at a fixed concentration of 0.6 g/mL, with the MP:GJL volume
ratio varied at 3:1, 2:1, 1:1, 1:2, and 1:3. As a result, UV-Vis absorption
spectra showed that the MP contributes to the UV-blue region (350-450), while
the GJL contributes to the red region (650-700 nm). The current-voltage (J-V)
analysis showed that the power conversion efficiency (PCE) of MP and GJL dyes
is 2.75% and 2.12%. The composite dye with a 1:3 (MP:GJL) ratio yielded the
highest PCE of 3.50%, demonstrating the synergistic effect of combining these
natural sensitizers to broaden the light absorption spectrum.

</details>


<div id='eess.SY'></div>

# eess.SY [[Back]](#toc)

### [495] [Safe and Stable Control via Lyapunov-Guided Diffusion Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25375)
*Xiaoyuan Cheng,Xiaohang Tang,Yiming Yang*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: S^2Diff是一个基于模型的扩散框架，利用李雅普诺夫理论确保控制策略的安全性与稳定性，无需复杂的梯度优化器或控制仿射结构。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有基于扩散模型的方法主要关注奖励最大化或成本最小化，忽略了安全性和稳定性，而S^2Diff旨在解决这一问题。

Method: S^2Diff利用李雅普诺夫理论，结合扩散模型和学习到的证书函数，来实现全局有效的控制策略，并发现了扩散采样与Almost Lyapunov理论的内在联系。

Result: 实验证明，S^2Diff在安全性、稳定性及整体控制性能方面均优于基于证书的控制器和基于模型的扩散基线方法。

Conclusion: S^2Diff成功地将扩散模型应用于保证控制策略的安全性和稳定性，并展现出优越的性能。

Abstract: Diffusion models have made significant strides in recent years, exhibiting
strong generalization capabilities in planning and control tasks. However, most
diffusion-based policies remain focused on reward maximization or cost
minimization, often overlooking critical aspects of safety and stability. In
this work, we propose Safe and Stable Diffusion ($S^2$Diff), a model-based
diffusion framework that explores how diffusion models can ensure safety and
stability from a Lyapunov perspective. We demonstrate that $S^2$Diff eliminates
the reliance on both complex gradient-based solvers (e.g., quadratic
programming, non-convex solvers) and control-affine structures, leading to
globally valid control policies driven by the learned certificate functions.
Additionally, we uncover intrinsic connections between diffusion sampling and
Almost Lyapunov theory, enabling the use of trajectory-level control policies
to learn better certificate functions for safety and stability guarantees. To
validate our approach, we conduct experiments on a wide variety of dynamical
control systems, where $S^2$Diff consistently outperforms both
certificate-based controllers and model-based diffusion baselines in terms of
safety, stability, and overall control performance.

</details>


### [496] [Spatiotemporal Forecasting of Incidents and Congestion with Implications for Sustainable Traffic Control](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25515)
*Tony Kinchen,Ting Bai,Nishanth Venkatesh S.,Andreas A. Malikopoulos*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本研究提出了一个基于仿真的框架，用于城市交通异常（如碰撞和中断）的建模、检测和预测。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 城市交通异常威胁着交通系统的安全、效率和可持续性。

Method: 该框架使用SUMO平台生成碰撞场景，并结合了双向长短期记忆网络和扩散卷积循环神经网络的混合预测模型。

Result: 在纽约市百老汇走廊的仿真研究表明，该框架能够生成一致的事件条件，量化其影响，并提供准确的、跨多个时间范围的交通预测。

Conclusion: 该研究强调了结合受控异常生成和深度预测模型，以支持可重复评估和可持续交通管理的价值。

Abstract: Urban traffic anomalies such as collisions and disruptions threaten the
safety, efficiency, and sustainability of transportation systems. We present a
simulation-based framework for modeling, detecting, and predicting such
anomalies in urban networks. Using the SUMO platform, we generate reproducible
rear-end and intersection crash scenarios with matched baselines, enabling
controlled experimentation and comparative evaluation. We record vehicle-level
travel time, speed, and emissions for edge and network-level analysis. On this
dataset, we develop a hybrid forecasting architecture that combines
bidirectional long short-term memory networks with a diffusion convolutional
recurrent neural network to capture temporal dynamics and spatial dependencies.
Our simulation studies on the Broadway corridor in New York City demonstrate
the framework's ability to reproduce consistent incident conditions, quantify
their effects, and provide accurate multi-horizon traffic forecasts. Our
results highlight the value of combining controlled anomaly generation with
deep predictive models to support reproducible evaluation and sustainable
traffic management.

</details>


### [497] [From Legacy to Leadership Intelligent Radio Network Planning Framework for Cell-Free Massive MIMO in B5G6G Era](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25517)
*Valdemar Farré,David Vega,Juan Estrada,Juan A. Vásquez Peralvo,Symeon Chatzinotas*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本论文提出了一种智能无线网络规划框架，用于将现有5G基础设施过渡到未来的5G/6G蜂窝网络架构，以优化覆盖范围和提高容量。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本论文旨在解决传统分布式大规模MIMO系统在无线网络部署中的局限性，并提出一种能够实现从现有5G网络到未来B5G/6G蜂窝网络演进的智能网络规划框架。

Method: 本论文提出了一种智能无线网络规划框架，利用现有5G部署的运行洞察力，解决覆盖优化和容量提升问题，并支持向蜂窝网络架构的演进。

Result: 通过在密集城市环境中的大量模拟，本研究实现了45%的频谱效率提升、30%的干扰减少和显著提高的均匀覆盖范围。

Conclusion: 本研究提出的框架为网络运营商提供了一条切实可行的路线图，以实现从传统蜂窝网络架构到满足B5G/6G要求的平稳过渡，同时最大限度地提高现有基础设施的投资回报。

Abstract: The proliferation of cell-free Massive MIMO represents a transformative shift
in wireless network architecture, addressing critical limitations of
conventional distributed Massive MIMO systems. This paper presents an
intelligent radio network planning framework that bridges legacy 5G
infrastructures with future B5G/6G networks through cell-free architectures. By
leveraging operational insights from existing 5G deployments, we systematically
address coverage optimization, and capacity enhancement. Our scalable framework
enables seamless evolution from legacy designs to next-generation cell-free
systems. Through extensive simulations in dense urban environments, we
demonstrate substantial improvements: 45% spectral efficiency gains, 30%
interference reduction, and significantly enhanced uniform coverage. The
proposed framework provides network operators with a practical roadmap for
transitioning from traditional cellular architectures to demanding B5G/6G
requirements while maximizing existing infrastructure investments.

</details>


### [498] [Modular Design of Strict Control Lyapunov Functions for Global Stabilization of the Unicycle in Polar Coordinates](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25575)
*Velimir Todorovski,Kwang Hak Kim,Miroslav Krstic*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种模块化框架，用于设计全局渐近稳定化极坐标下的自行车控制律，该控制律具有双向行驶能力，便于停车，并使用严格控制李雅普诺夫函数（CLFs）保证稳定性和收敛速率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在笛卡尔坐标系下，Brockett条件排除了静态反馈稳定化，但极坐标下的自行车可以被平滑反馈全局渐近稳定化。然而，现有的方法缺乏模块化和效率。

Method: 提出一个模块化框架，设计平滑反馈控制律。控制律具有双向性，并与模块化构造的严格控制李雅普诺夫函数（CLFs）配对。同时，还提出了包含严格CLFs的屏障李雅普诺夫函数（BLFs）的变体。

Result: 该方法实现了对极坐标下自行车的全局渐近稳定化，并具有明确的收敛速率。屏障CLFs实现了“几乎全局”的稳定化，仅排除零测度流形子集。控制律的双向性支持高效的停车操作。

Conclusion: 该模块化框架成功地设计了用于极坐标下自行车的全局渐近稳定化控制律，并提供了严格的CLFs来保证稳定性和收敛性。此外，还通过屏障CLFs实现了“几乎全局”的稳定化，并为后续研究（如逆最优设计）奠定了基础。

Abstract: Since the mid-1990s, it has been known that, unlike in Cartesian form where
Brockett's condition rules out static feedback stabilization, the unicycle is
globally asymptotically stabilizable by smooth feedback in polar coordinates.
In this note, we introduce a modular framework for designing smooth feedback
laws that achieve global asymptotic stabilization in polar coordinates. These
laws are bidirectional, enabling efficient parking maneuvers, and are paired
with families of strict control Lyapunov functions (CLFs) constructed in a
modular fashion. The resulting CLFs guarantee global asymptotic stability with
explicit convergence rates and include barrier variants that yield "almost
global" stabilization, excluding only zero-measure subsets of the rotation
manifolds. The strictness of the CLFs is further leveraged in our companion
paper, where we develop inverse-optimal redesigns with meaningful cost
functions and infinite gain margins.

</details>


### [499] [Integrator Forwading Design for Unicycles with Constant and Actuated Velocity in Polar Coordinates](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25579)
*Miroslav Krstic,Velimir Todorovski,Kwang Hak Kim,Alessandro Astolfi*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种新的控制方法，结合了回溯法和积分器前馈法，用于解决独轮车和Dubins汽车的稳定和停泊问题，并发现了两种方法之间的基本联系。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 利用积分器前馈法来构建新的光滑转向定律和控制李雅普诺夫函数（CLFs），以扩展用于逆最优控制设计的CLFs集合。

Method: 将回溯法和积分器前转法应用于独轮车和Dubins汽车的稳定和停泊问题，并分析了两种方法的联系。

Result: 回溯法和积分器前转法在独轮车和Dubins汽车的停泊问题上产生相同类别的解，揭示了两者之间的基本联系。

Conclusion: 回溯法和积分器前转法在独轮车和Dubins汽车的稳定和停泊问题上存在基本联系，并且可以生成相同的解决方案。

Abstract: In a companion paper, we present a modular framework for unicycle
stabilization in polar coordinates that provides smooth steering laws through
backstepping. Surprisingly, the same problem also allows the application of
integrator forwarding. In this work, we leverage this feature and construct new
smooth steering laws together with control Lyapunov functions (CLFs), expanding
the set of CLFs available for inverse optimal control design. In the case of
constant forward velocity (Dubins car), backstepping produces finite-time
(deadbeat) parking, and we show that integrator forwarding yields the very same
class of solutions. This reveals a fundamental connection between backstepping
and forwarding in addressing both the unicycle and, the Dubins car parking
problems.

</details>


### [500] [Pinching-Antenna Systems (PASS)-Enabled UAV Delivery](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25698)
